é©¬å°”å¯å¤«ä¸ç­‰å¼æŠŠæ¦‚ç‡å…³è”åˆ°æ•°å­¦æœŸæœ›ï¼Œç»™å‡ºäº†éšæœºå˜é‡çš„ç´¯ç§¯åˆ†å¸ƒå‡½æ•°ä¸€ä¸ªå®½æ³›ä½†ä»æœ‰ç”¨çš„ç•Œã€‚

å®šä¹‰

é©¬å°”å¯å¤«ä¸ç­‰å¼ç”¨äºä¼°è®¡å°¾äº‹ä»¶çš„æ¦‚ç‡ä¸Šç•Œã€‚

  • è‹¥éšæœºå˜é‡$X$åªå–éè´Ÿå€¼ï¼Œåˆ™$\forall a>0$æœ‰ï¼š

$$
\mathbb{P}(X \geq a) \leq \frac{\mathbb{E}(X)}{a}
$$

è¯æ˜

æ€è·¯1

æ”¾å¤§æ¦‚ç‡ï¼Œå¾—åˆ°éƒ¨åˆ†å‡½æ•°æœŸæœ›

æˆªæ–­å‡½æ•°æœŸæœ›ï¼ŒäºŒè€…ç›¸æ¯”è¾ƒ

  • è€ƒè™‘ $X\ge a$çš„æƒ…å†µ â†’ $\frac {X}{a} \ge 1$
  • å¯¹äºä¸ç­‰å¼å·¦è¾¹æœ‰ï¼š

$$
\mathbb P(X \geq a)=\int_{a}^{+\infty} f(x) d x \leq \int_{a}^{+\infty} \frac{X}{a} f(x) d x
$$

  • å¯¹äºä¸ç­‰å¼å³è¾¹æœ‰ï¼š

$$
E\left(\frac{X}{a}\right)=\int_{-\infty}^{a} \frac{X}{a} f(x) d x+\int_{a}^{+\infty} \frac{X}{a} f(x) d x
$$

  • ç”±äºï¼š

$$
\int_{-\infty}^{a} \frac{X}{a} f(x) d x \geq 0
$$

  • å› æ­¤ï¼š

$$
\mathbb P(X \geq a) \leq \int_{a}^{+\infty} \frac{X}{a} f(x) d x \leq E\left(\frac{X}{a}\right)
$$

  • å³ï¼š

$$
\mathbb P(X \geq a) \leq E\left(\frac{X}{a}\right)=\frac{E(X)}{a}
$$

æ€è·¯2

åŸå§‹æœŸæœ›å¤§äºæˆªæ–­éƒ¨åˆ†éè´Ÿå€¼çš„æœŸæœ›

æ±‚å–æœŸæœ›æ—¶ç¼©å°$X$å¾—åˆ°$a$

$$
\begin{aligned}
\mathbb{E}(X) &=\int_{-\infty}^{\infty} x f(x) d x \
& \geq \int_{a}^{\infty} x f(x) d x \quad(a \geq 0) \
& \geq \int_{a}^{\infty} a f(x) d x \
&=a \int_{a}^{\infty} f(x) d x \
&=a \mathbb{P}(X \geq a)
\end{aligned}
$$

å›¾ç¤º

$a$è¶Šå¤§äºå‡å€¼ï¼Œ$X>a$çš„æ¦‚ç‡è¶Šå°

ä¾‹å¦‚ï¼š

entry.title: æ¦‚ç‡è®ºåŸºç¡€ - 4 - åæ–¹å·®ã€ç›¸å…³ç³»æ•°ã€åæ–¹å·®çŸ©é˜µ
entry.content:
æœ¬æ–‡ä»‹ç»åæ–¹å·®ã€‚

åæ–¹å·®

åæ–¹å·®è¡¨ç¤ºçš„æ˜¯ä¸¤ä¸ªå˜é‡çš„æ€»ä½“çš„è¯¯å·®ï¼Œè¿™ä¸åªè¡¨ç¤ºä¸€ä¸ªå˜é‡è¯¯å·®çš„æ–¹å·®ä¸åŒã€‚ å¦‚æœä¸¤ä¸ªå˜é‡çš„å˜åŒ–è¶‹åŠ¿ä¸€è‡´ï¼Œä¹Ÿå°±æ˜¯è¯´å¦‚æœå…¶ä¸­ä¸€ä¸ªå¤§äºè‡ªèº«çš„æœŸæœ›å€¼ï¼Œå¦å¤–ä¸€ä¸ªä¹Ÿå¤§äºè‡ªèº«çš„æœŸæœ›å€¼ï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆä¸¤ä¸ªå˜é‡ä¹‹é—´çš„åæ–¹å·®å°±æ˜¯æ­£å€¼ã€‚ å¦‚æœä¸¤ä¸ªå˜é‡çš„å˜åŒ–è¶‹åŠ¿ç›¸åï¼Œå³å…¶ä¸­ä¸€ä¸ªå¤§äºè‡ªèº«çš„æœŸæœ›å€¼ï¼Œå¦å¤–ä¸€ä¸ªå´å°äºè‡ªèº«çš„æœŸæœ›å€¼ï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆä¸¤ä¸ªå˜é‡ä¹‹é—´çš„åæ–¹å·®å°±æ˜¯è´Ÿå€¼ã€‚ â€”â€” ç™¾åº¦ç™¾ç§‘

å®šä¹‰

  • åœ¨æ¦‚ç‡è®ºå’Œç»Ÿè®¡å­¦ä¸­ï¼Œåæ–¹å·®ç”¨äºè¡¡é‡ä¸¤ä¸ªå˜é‡çš„æ€»ä½“è¯¯å·®ã€‚è€Œæ–¹å·®æ˜¯åæ–¹å·®çš„ä¸€ç§ç‰¹æ®Šæƒ…å†µï¼Œå³å½“ä¸¤ä¸ªå˜é‡æ˜¯ç›¸åŒçš„æƒ…å†µã€‚
  • æœŸæœ›å€¼åˆ†åˆ«ä¸º$E[X]$ä¸$E[Y]$çš„ä¸¤ä¸ªå®éšæœºå˜é‡$X$ä¸$Y$ä¹‹é—´çš„**åæ–¹å·®$Cov(X,Y)$å®šä¹‰ä¸ºï¼š
$$\begin{aligned}\operatorname{Cov}(X, Y) &=E[(X-E[X])(Y-E[Y])] \\&=E[X Y]-2 E[Y] E[X]+E[X] E[Y] \\&=E[X Y]-E[X] E[Y]\end{aligned}$$

ç›¸å…³ç³»æ•°

  • å®šä¹‰éšæœºå˜é‡$X$ä¸$Y$çš„ç›¸å…³ç³»æ•°ï¼š

$$
\rho_{X Y}=\frac{\operatorname{Cov}[X, Y]}{\sqrt{\operatorname{Var}[X]} \sqrt{\operatorname{Var}[Y]}}
$$

  • ç›¸å…³ç³»æ•°æ˜¯åæ–¹å·®çš„å½’ä¸€åŒ–

ä¸æ–¹å·®çš„å…³ç³»

  • ç”±å®šä¹‰å¯çŸ¥ï¼š
$$\begin{array}{c}\operatorname{Cov}[X, Y]=\operatorname{Cov}[Y, X] \\\operatorname{Cov}[X, X]=\operatorname{Var}[X] \\\operatorname{Var}[X+Y]=\operatorname{Var}[X]+\operatorname{Var}[Y]+2 \operatorname{Cov}[X, Y]\end{array}$$

åæ–¹å·®çš„æ€§è´¨

  • $a, b$ ä¸ºå¸¸æ•°ï¼Œæœ‰ï¼š
    $$
    \operatorname{Cov}[a X, b Y]=a b \operatorname{Cov}[X, Y]
    $$

  • å˜é‡å’Œçš„åæ–¹å·®ï¼š

$$
\operatorname{Cov}\left[X_{1}+X_{2}, Y\right]=\operatorname{Cov}\left[X_{1}, Y\right]+\operatorname{Cov}\left[X_{2}, Y\right]
$$

  • è¿ç»­å˜é‡çš„åæ–¹å·®ï¼š

$$
\operatorname{Cov}[f(X), g(Y)]=\mathbb{E}[(f(X)-\mathbb{E}[f(X)])(g(Y)-\mathbb{E}[g(Y)])]
$$

  • è¿ç»­å˜é‡çš„åæ–¹å·®ç³»æ•°ï¼š

$$
\rho[f(X), g(Y)]=\frac{\operatorname{Cov}[f(X), g(Y)]}{\sqrt{\operatorname{Var}[f(X)]} \sqrt{\operatorname{Var}[g(Y)]}}
$$

åæ–¹å·®çš„ç‰©ç†æ„ä¹‰

  • åæ–¹å·®çš„ç»å¯¹å€¼è¶Šå¤§ï¼Œè¯´æ˜ä¸¤ä¸ªéšæœºå˜é‡éƒ½è¿œç¦»å®ƒä»¬çš„å‡å€¼

  • åæ–¹å·®ä¸ºæ­£ï¼Œåˆ™è¯´æ˜ä¸¤ä¸ªéšæœºå˜é‡åŒæ—¶è¶‹å‘äºå–è¾ƒå¤§çš„å€¼æˆ–è€…åŒæ—¶è¶‹å‘äºå–è¾ƒå°çš„å€¼

  • åæ–¹å·®ä¸ºè´Ÿï¼Œåˆ™è¯´æ˜ä¸€ä¸ªéšå˜é‡è¶‹å‘äºå–è¾ƒå¤§çš„å€¼ï¼Œå¦ä¸€ä¸ªéšæœºå˜é‡è¶‹å‘äºå–è¾ƒå°çš„å€¼

  • ä¸¤ä¸ªéšæœºå˜é‡çš„ç‹¬ç«‹æ€§å¯ä»¥å¯¼å‡ºåæ–¹å·®ä¸ºé›¶ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯ä¸¤ä¸ªéšæœºå˜é‡çš„åæ–¹å·®ä¸ºé›¶æ— æ³•å¯¼å‡ºç‹¬ç«‹æ€§â€”â€”æ­£äº¤-ä¸ç›¸å…³-ç‹¬ç«‹

    å› ä¸ºç‹¬ç«‹æ€§ä¹ŸåŒ…æ‹¬ï¼šæ²¡æœ‰éçº¿æ€§å…³ç³»

    æœ‰å¯èƒ½ä¸¤ä¸ªéšæœºå˜é‡æ˜¯éç‹¬ç«‹çš„ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯åæ–¹å·®ä¸ºé›¶

    å¦‚ï¼šå‡è®¾éšæœºå˜é‡ $X \sim U[-1,1]$ã€‚å®šä¹‰éšæœºå˜é‡ çš„æ¦‚ç‡åˆ†å¸ƒå‡½æ•°ä¸ºï¼š
    $$
    P(S=1)=\frac{1}{2} P(S=-1)=\frac{1}{2}
    $$
    å®šä¹‰éšæœºå˜é‡ $Y=SX$ï¼Œåˆ™éšæœºå˜é‡$X,Y$æ˜¯éç‹¬ç«‹çš„ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯æœ‰ï¼š
    $$

ç›¸å…³ç³»æ•°çš„ç‰©ç†æ„ä¹‰

è€ƒè™‘ä»¥éšæœºå˜é‡$X$çš„çº¿æ€§å‡½æ•°$a+bX$ æ¥è¿‘ä¼¼è¡¨ç¤º$Y$ã€‚

  • å‡æ–¹è¯¯å·®ï¼Œ$e$ä¸ºï¼š

$$
e=\mathbb{E}\left[(Y-(a+b X)){2}\right]=\mathbb{E}\left[Y{2}\right]+b^{2} \mathbb{E}\left[X{2}\right]+a{2}-2 b \mathbb{E}[X Y]+2 a b \mathbb{E}[X]-2 a \mathbb{E}[Y]
$$

  • eå–æå°å€¼ï¼Œè¯¥ä¼˜åŒ–é—®é¢˜ä¸ºå‡¸ä¼˜åŒ–ï¼Œç›´æ¥æ±‚å¯¼ä¸º0å³å¯ï¼š
$$\left\{ \begin{array}{l}\frac{{\partial e}}{{\partial a}} = 2a + 2b\mathbb{E}[X] - 2\mathbb{E}[Y] = 0\\\frac{{\partial e}}{{\partial b}} = 2b\mathbb{E}[{X^2}] - 2\mathbb{E}[XY] + 2a\mathbb{E}[X] = 0\end{array} \right.$$
  • è§£å¾—ï¼š
$$\left\{ {\begin{array}{*{20}{c}}{a = \mathbb{E}[Y] - \frac{{Cov[X,Y]}}{{Var[X]}}\mathbb{E}[X]}\\{b = \frac{{Cov[X,Y]}}{{Var[X]}}}\end{array}} \right.$$
  • å¸¦å…¥$e$å¾—ï¼š

$$
\min (e)=\mathbb{E}\left[\left(Y-\left(a_{0}+b_{0} X\right)\right)^{2}\right]=\left(1-\rho_{X Y}^{2}\right) \operatorname{Var}[Y]
$$

  • å› æ­¤æœ‰ä»¥ä¸‹å®šç†ï¼š

    • $\left|\rho_{X Y}\right| \leq 1$
    • $|\rho_{X Y}| = 1$çš„å……è¦æ¡ä»¶ä¸ºï¼šå­˜åœ¨å¸¸æ•°$a,b$ä½¿å¾—$Y=a+bX$

  • å½“$\left|\rho_{X Y}\right|$è¾ƒå¤§æ—¶ï¼Œ $e$è¾ƒå°ï¼Œæ„å‘³ç€éšæœºå˜é‡$X$å’Œ$Y$è”ç³»è¾ƒç´§å¯†ã€‚äºæ˜¯$\rho_{X Y}$ æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªè¡¨å¾ $X$ã€$Y$ä¹‹é—´çº¿æ€§å…³ç³»ç´§å¯†ç¨‹åº¦çš„é‡

  • å½“$\rho_{X Y}=0$æ—¶ï¼Œç§°$X$å’Œ$Y$ ä¸ç›¸å…³ã€‚

    • ä¸ç›¸å…³æ˜¯å°±çº¿æ€§å…³ç³»æ¥è®²çš„ï¼Œè€Œç›¸äº’ç‹¬ç«‹æ˜¯ä¸€èˆ¬å…³ç³»è€Œè¨€çš„ã€‚
    • ç›¸äº’ç‹¬ç«‹ä¸€å®šä¸ç›¸å…³ï¼›ä¸ç›¸å…³åˆ™æœªå¿…ç‹¬ç«‹ã€‚

çŸ©

  • è®¾$X$å’Œ$Y$æ˜¯éšæœºå˜é‡ï¼š
    • è‹¥$\mathbb{E}\left[X^{k}\right], k=1,2, \cdots$å­˜åœ¨ï¼Œåˆ™ç§°å®ƒä¸º$X$çš„$k$é˜¶åŸç‚¹çŸ©ï¼Œç®€ç§°$k$é˜¶çŸ©ã€‚
    • è‹¥$\mathbb{E}\left[(X-\mathbb{E}[X])^{k}\right], k=2,3, \cdots$å­˜åœ¨ï¼Œåˆ™ç§°å®ƒä¸º$X$çš„$k$é˜¶ä¸­å¿ƒçŸ©ã€‚
    • è‹¥$\mathbb{E}\left[X^{k} Y^{l}\right], k, l=1,2, \cdots$å­˜åœ¨ï¼Œåˆ™ç§°å®ƒä¸º$X$çš„$Y$çš„$k+l$é˜¶æ··åˆçŸ©ã€‚
    • è‹¥$\mathbb{E}\left[(X-\mathbb{E}[X]){k}(Y-\mathbb{E}[Y]){l}\right], k, l=1,2, \cdots$å­˜åœ¨ï¼Œåˆ™ç§°å®ƒä¸º$X$çš„$Y$çš„$k+l$é˜¶æ··åˆä¸­å¿ƒçŸ©ã€‚
  • æœŸæœ›æ˜¯ä¸€é˜¶åŸç‚¹çŸ©
  • æ–¹å·®æ˜¯äºŒé˜¶ä¸­å¿ƒçŸ©
  • åæ–¹å·®æ˜¯äºŒé˜¶æ··åˆä¸­å¿ƒçŸ©

åæ–¹å·®çŸ©é˜µ

  • è®¾$n$ç»´éšæœºå˜é‡$(X_1,X_2, \dots,X_n)$çš„äºŒé˜¶æ··åˆä¸­å¿ƒçŸ©

$$
c_{i j}=\operatorname{Cov}\left[X_{i}, X_{j}\right]=\mathbb{E}\left[\left(X_{i}-\mathbb{E}\left[X_{i}\right]\right)\left(X_{j}-\mathbb{E}\left[X_{j}\right]\right)\right]

  • éƒ½å­˜åœ¨ï¼Œåˆ™ç§°çŸ©é˜µï¼š
$$\mathbf{C}=\left[\begin{array}{cccc}c_{11} & c_{12} & \cdots & c_{1 n} \\c_{21} & c_{22} & \cdots & c_{2 n} \\\vdots & \vdots & \ddots & \vdots \\c_{n 1} & c_{n 2} & \cdots & c_{n n}\end{array}\right]$$
  • ä¸º$n$ç»´éšæœºå˜é‡$(X_1,X_2, \dots,X_n)$çš„åæ–¹å·®çŸ©é˜µ
  • ç”±äº$c_{ij} = c_{ji}$ å› æ­¤åæ–¹å·®çŸ©é˜µæ˜¯å¯¹ç§°é˜µ
  • ç”±äºå¯¹è§’çº¿ä¸ºå„ä¸ªå˜é‡çš„æ–¹å·®ï¼Œå› æ­¤å¯¹è§’çº¿éè´Ÿ
  • é€šå¸¸$n$ ç»´éšæœºå˜é‡çš„åˆ†å¸ƒæ˜¯ä¸çŸ¥é“çš„ï¼Œæˆ–è€…å¤ªå¤æ‚ä»¥è‡´æ•°å­¦ä¸Šä¸å®¹æ˜“å¤„ç†ï¼Œå› æ­¤å®é™…ä¸­åæ–¹å·®çŸ©é˜µéå¸¸é‡è¦ã€‚

entry.content:
æœ¬æ–‡ä»‹ç»æ–¹å·®ã€‚

æ–¹å·®

å®šä¹‰

æ•°å­¦æœŸæœ›(mean)ï¼ˆæˆ–å‡å€¼ï¼Œäº¦ç®€ç§°æœŸæœ›ï¼‰æ˜¯è¯•éªŒä¸­æ¯æ¬¡å¯èƒ½ç»“æœçš„æ¦‚ç‡ä¹˜ä»¥å…¶ç»“æœçš„æ€»å’Œï¼Œæ˜¯æœ€åŸºæœ¬çš„æ•°å­¦ç‰¹å¾ä¹‹ä¸€ã€‚å®ƒåæ˜ éšæœºå˜é‡å¹³å‡å–å€¼çš„å¤§å°ã€‚ â€”â€”ç™¾åº¦ç™¾ç§‘

  • å¯¹éšæœºå˜é‡$X$ï¼Œè‹¥$\mathbb{E}\left[(X-\mathbb{E}[X])^{2}\right]$å­˜åœ¨ï¼Œåˆ™ç§°å®ƒä¸º$X$çš„æ–¹å·®ï¼Œè®°ä½œ $Var[X]$ã€‚
  • $X$çš„æ ‡å‡†å·®ä¸ºæ–¹å·®çš„å¼€å¹³æ–¹ï¼š$\sigma=\sqrt{\operatorname{Var}[X]}$
    • æ–¹å·®åº¦é‡äº†éšæœºå˜é‡$X$ä¸æœŸæœ›å€¼åç¦»çš„ç¨‹åº¦ï¼Œè¡¡é‡äº†$X$å–å€¼åˆ†æ•£ç¨‹åº¦çš„ä¸€ä¸ªå°ºåº¦ã€‚
  • å¯¹äºä¸€ä¸ªæœŸæœ›ä¸º$\mu$ ï¼Œ æ–¹å·®ä¸º$\sigma^2$çš„éšæœºå˜é‡$X$ ï¼Œéšæœºå˜é‡$X^{}=\frac{X-\mu}{\sigma}$çš„æ•°å­¦æœŸæœ›ä¸º0ï¼Œæ–¹å·®ä¸º1ã€‚ ç§°$X^$ä¸º$X$çš„æ ‡å‡†åŒ–å˜é‡

æ€§è´¨

  • å¸¸æ•°çš„æ–¹å·®æ’ä¸º 0
  • å¯¹å¸¸æ•°$C$ï¼Œæœ‰ï¼š

$$
\operatorname{Var}[C X]=C^{2} \operatorname{Var}[X]
$$

  • å¯¹ä¸¤ä¸ªéšæœºå˜é‡$X,Y$ï¼Œæœ‰ï¼š

$$
\operatorname{Var}[X+Y]=\operatorname{Var}[X]+\operatorname{Var}[Y]+2 \mathbb{E}[(X-\mathbb{E}[X])(Y-\mathbb{E}[Y])]
$$

  • å½“$X,Y$ç›¸äº’ç‹¬ç«‹æ—¶ï¼Œæœ‰ï¼š

$$
\operatorname{Var}[X+Y]=\operatorname{Var}[X]+\operatorname{Var}[Y]
$$

  • å¯ä»¥æ¨å¹¿è‡³ä»»æ„æœ‰é™å¤šä¸ªç›¸äº’ç‹¬ç«‹çš„éšæœºå˜é‡ä¹‹å’Œçš„æƒ…å†µã€‚

æ ·æœ¬æ–¹å·®çš„å‡å€¼ä¼°è®¡

å‡è®¾$X$ä¸ºç‹¬ç«‹åŒåˆ†å¸ƒçš„ä¸€ç»„éšæœºå˜é‡ï¼Œæ€»ä½“ä¸º$M$ï¼ŒéšæœºæŠ½å–$N$ä¸ªéšæœºå˜é‡æ„æˆä¸€ä¸ªæ ·æœ¬ï¼Œ$\mathrm{E}\left(\mathrm{X}_{\mathrm{i}}\right)=\mu$å’Œ$\mathrm{D}\left(\mathrm{X}_{\mathrm{i}}\right)=\sigma^{2}$æ˜¯æ€»ä½“çš„å‡å€¼å’Œæ–¹å·®, æ˜¯å¸¸æ•°ã€‚

$\overline{\mathrm{X}}, \mathrm{S}^{2}$æ˜¯æ ·æœ¬çš„å‡å€¼å’Œæ–¹å·®ï¼Œç”±äºæ ·æœ¬æ˜¯éšæœºæŠ½å–çš„ï¼Œ$\overline{\mathrm{X}}, \mathrm{S}^{2}$ä¹Ÿæ˜¯éšæœºçš„ã€‚

å®é™…å·¥ä½œä¸­ï¼Œæ€»ä½“å‡æ•°éš¾ä»¥å¾—åˆ°æ—¶ï¼Œåº”ç”¨æ ·æœ¬ç»Ÿè®¡é‡ä»£æ›¿æ€»ä½“å‚æ•°ã€‚

æˆ‘ä»¬æ¥ä¸‹æ¥è®¨è®ºç”¨æ ·æœ¬ç»Ÿè®¡é‡ä»£æ›¿æ€»ä½“æ ·æœ¬å‚æ•°ä¼šå¾—åˆ°ä»€ä¹ˆæ ·çš„å‡å€¼å’Œæ–¹å·®ç»“æœã€‚

æ ·æœ¬å‡å€¼$\overline{\mathrm{X}}$
  • è€ƒè™‘$\overline{\mathrm{X}}$çš„å‡å€¼ï¼š
$$\mathrm{E}(\overline{\mathrm{X}})=\mathrm{E}\left(\frac{1}{\mathrm{n}} \sum_{\mathrm{i}=1}^{\mathrm{n}} \mathrm{X}_{\mathrm{i}}\right)=\frac{1}{\mathrm{n}} \sum_{\mathrm{i}=1}^{\mathrm{n}} \mathrm{E}\left(\mathrm{X}_{\mathrm{i}}\right)=\frac{1}{\mathrm{n}} \times \mathrm{nE}\left(\mathrm{X}_{\mathrm{i}}\right)=\mu$$
  • è€ƒè™‘$\overline{\mathrm{X}}$çš„æ–¹å·®ï¼š
$$\mathrm{D}(\overline{\mathrm{X}})=\mathrm{D}\left(\frac{1}{\mathrm{n}} \sum_{\mathrm{i}=1}^{\mathrm{n}} \mathrm{X}_{\mathrm{i}}\right)=\frac{1}{\mathrm{n}^{2}} \sum_{\mathrm{i}=1}^{\mathrm{n}} \mathrm{D}\left(\mathrm{X}_{\mathrm{i}}\right)=\frac{\sigma^{2}}{\mathrm{n}}$$
æ ·æœ¬æ–¹å·®$S^2$
  • è€ƒè™‘$S^2$çš„å‡å€¼ï¼š
$$\begin{array}{l}\mathrm{E}\left(\mathrm{S}^{2}\right)&=\mathrm{E}\left[\frac{1}{\mathrm{n}} \sum_{\mathrm{i}=1}^{\mathrm{n}}\left(\mathrm{X}_{\mathrm{i}}-\overline{\mathrm{X}}\right)^{2}\right]\\&=\frac{1}{\mathrm{n}} \mathrm{E}\left[\sum_{\mathrm{i}=1}^{\mathrm{n}}\left(\mathrm{X}_{\mathrm{i}}^{2}-2 \mathrm{X}_{\mathrm{i}} \overline{\mathrm{X}}+\overline{\mathrm{X}}^{2}\right)\right] \\&=\frac{1}{\mathrm{n}} \mathrm{E}\left[\sum_{\mathrm{i}=1}^{\mathrm{n}}\left(\mathrm{X}_{\mathrm{i}}^{2}\right)\right]-\frac{1}{\mathrm{n}} \mathrm{E}\left(2 \overline{\mathrm{X}} \times \mathrm{n} \overline{\mathrm{X}}-\mathrm{n} \overline{\mathrm{X}}^{2}\right)\\&=\frac{1}{\mathrm{n}} \sum_{\mathrm{i}=1}^{\mathrm{n}} \mathrm{E}\left(\mathrm{X}_{i}^{2}\right)-\mathrm{E}\left(\overline{\mathrm{X}}^{2}\right) \\\end{array}$$
  • æ ¹æ®æ ·æœ¬æ–¹å·®è®¡ç®—å…¬å¼ï¼š

$$
D({X_i}) = {E^2}({X_i}) - E(X_i^2) = {\sigma ^2}
$$

  • å¾—ï¼š

$$
E(X_i^2) = {E^2}({X_i}) + {\sigma ^2} = {\mu ^2} + {\sigma ^2}
$$

  • æ ¹æ®$\overline{\mathrm{X}}$çš„æ–¹å·®æ¨å¯¼ç»“æœï¼š
$$\begin{array}{l}{\rm{D}}(\overline {\rm{X}} ) = E({\overline {\rm{X}} ^2}) - {E^2}(\overline {\rm{X}} ) = \frac{{{\sigma ^2}}}{{\rm{n}}}\\E({\overline {\rm{X}} ^2}) = {E^2}(\overline {\rm{X}} ) + \frac{{{\sigma ^2}}}{{\rm{n}}}=\mu^2+\frac{{{\sigma^2}}}{{\rm{n}}}\end{array}$$
  • å°†ä¸Šè¿°ç»“æœå¸¦å…¥$E(S^2)$è®¡ç®—è¿‡ç¨‹ï¼š
$$\begin{array}{l}{\rm{E}}\left( {{{\rm{S}}^2}} \right) &= \frac{1}{{\rm{n}}}\sum\limits_{{\rm{i}} = 1}^{\rm{n}} {\rm{E}} \left( {{\rm{X}}_i^2} \right) - {\rm{E}}\left( {{{\overline {\rm{X}} }^2}} \right)\\ &= \frac{1}{n} \cdot n({\mu ^2} + {\sigma ^2}) - ({\mu ^2} + \frac{{{\sigma ^2}}}{{\rm{n}}})\\ &= {\mu ^2} + {\sigma ^2} - {\mu ^2} - \frac{{{\sigma ^2}}}{{\rm{n}}}\\ &= \frac{{n - 1}}{n}{\sigma ^2}\end{array}$$
  • ä¹Ÿå°±æ˜¯è¯´æ ·æœ¬æ–¹å·®çš„æœŸæœ›å¹¶ä¸ç­‰äºæ€»ä½“æ ·æœ¬çš„æ–¹å·®ï¼Œè¿™ä¸ªä¼°è®¡$E(S^2)$è¢«ç§°ä¸ºæ ·æœ¬æ–¹å·®çš„æœ‰åä¼°è®¡
  • å¦‚æœæƒ³æ±‚æ ·æœ¬æ–¹å·®çš„æ— åä¼°è®¡ï¼Œéœ€è¦ä¹˜ä¸Šä¸€ä¸ªç³»æ•°ï¼š

$$
\frac{\mathrm{n}}{\mathrm{n}-1} \mathrm{~S}^{2}=\frac{1}{\mathrm{n}-1} \sum_{\mathrm{i}=1}{\mathrm{n}}\left(\mathrm{X}_{\mathrm{i}}-\overline{\mathrm{X}}\right){2}=\sigma^2
$$

  • å…¶ä¸­ï¼š$n-1$ä¸ºè‡ªç”±åº¦ï¼Œå°±æ˜¯è¯´ï¼Œåœ¨ä¸€ä¸ªå®¹é‡ä¸º$n$çš„æ ·æœ¬é‡Œï¼Œå½“ç¡®å®šäº†$n-1$ä¸ªå˜é‡ä»¥åï¼Œç¬¬$n$ä¸ªå˜é‡å°±ç¡®å®šäº†ï¼Œå› ä¸ºæ ·æœ¬å‡å€¼æ˜¯æ— åçš„ã€‚

  • è‹¥å³ä¾§çº§æ•°ä¸æ”¶æ•›ï¼Œåˆ™æœŸæœ›ä¸å­˜åœ¨ã€‚

  • è‹¥å³ä¾§çº§æ•°ä¸æ”¶æ•›ï¼Œåˆ™æœŸæœ›ä¸å­˜åœ¨ã€‚

å®šç†

ç¦»æ•£å‹

$$
\mathbb{E}[Y]=\mathbb{E}[g(X)]=\sum_{i=1}^{\infty} g\left(x_{i}\right) p_{i}

$$\mathbb{E}_{X \sim P(X)}[g(X)]=\sum_{x} g(x) p(x)$$
è¿ç»­å‹

entry.title: SVM çš„æ¨å¯¼
entry.content:
SVMï¼ˆSupport Vector Machineï¼Œæ”¯æŒå‘é‡æœºï¼‰æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªçº¿æ€§åˆ†ç±»å™¨ï¼Œæ˜¯æœ€ç»å…¸çš„åˆ†ç±»ç®—æ³•ï¼Œå…¶æ ¸å¿ƒç›®æ ‡å°±æ˜¯æ‰¾åˆ°æœ€å¤§é—´éš”è¶…å¹³é¢ã€‚æœ¬æ–‡è®°å½•SVMçš„æ¨å¯¼è¿‡ç¨‹ã€‚

æ¦‚è¿°

SVMå°±æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªåˆ†ç±»å™¨ï¼Œåªæ˜¯ç›¸å¯¹äºä¼ ç»Ÿçš„çº¿æ€§åˆ†ç±»å™¨ï¼Œå®ƒæ·»åŠ äº†ä¸€ä¸ªæ”¯æŒå‘é‡çš„æ¦‚å¿µã€‚

  • è€ƒè™‘ä¸€ä¸ªåˆ†ç±»ä»»åŠ¡

ä»å›¾ç‰‡ä¸Šè§£é‡Šï¼Œå¯¹äºä¸€ç»„æ•°æ®ï¼ŒSVMåœ¨ä½¿ç”¨ç›´çº¿çš„åŒæ—¶è¦æ±‚æ•°æ®ç‚¹è·ç¦»è¿™æ¡ç›´çº¿çš„æœ€å°è·ç¦»æœ€å¤§ï¼Œä¹Ÿå°±æ˜¯è¯´åˆ†ç±»å™¨å’Œæ•°æ®ä¹‹é—´è¦æœ‰è¶³å¤Ÿå¤§çš„â€œé—´éš”â€ã€‚è¿™æ ·åšçš„å¥½å¤„æ˜¯å¾ˆæ˜æ˜¾çš„ï¼Œè¶Šå¤§çš„â€œé—´éš”â€ä»£è¡¨äº†æ›´å¤§çš„è½¬åœœç©ºé—´ï¼Œåœ¨å¾—åˆ°æ–°çš„æ•°æ®ä¹‹åæ›´å®¹æ˜“å°†å…¶æ­£ç¡®åˆ†ç±»ã€‚

è€ŒSVMçš„å·¥ä½œå°±æ˜¯æ±‚è§£è¿™ä¸ªæœ€å¤§é—´éš”ï¼Œä¹Ÿå°±æ˜¯æœ€ä¼˜åŒ–é—®é¢˜ã€‚å¯¹äºçº¿æ€§å¯åˆ†çš„æ•°æ®ï¼Œå¯ä»¥ç›´æ¥å¥—ç”¨çº¿æ€§è§„åˆ’çš„çŸ¥è¯†è¿›è¡Œæ¨å¯¼ï¼Œä½†å¦‚æœæ•°æ®çº¿æ€§ä¸å¯åˆ†ï¼Œå°±éœ€è¦æ ¸å‡½æ•°è¿›è¡Œæ•°æ®å‡ç»´ï¼Œè¿›è¡Œè¶…å¹³é¢åˆ†ç±»ã€‚

ç›®æ ‡å‡½æ•°

SVMæ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªçº¿æ€§åˆ†ç±»å™¨ï¼ŒSVMçš„ç›®æ ‡å°±æ˜¯æ‰¾åˆ°æœ€å¤§é—´éš”è¶…å¹³é¢ã€‚

  • å®šä¹‰ä»»æ„çš„è¶…å¹³é¢å‡½æ•°ä¸ºï¼š

$$
\bf{w}^{T} \bf{x}+b=0
$$

  • äºŒç»´ç©ºé—´ç‚¹$(x,y)$åˆ°ç›´çº¿$Ax+By+C=0$çš„è·ç¦»ä¸ºï¼š

$$
\frac{|A x+B y+C|}{\sqrt{A{2}+B{2}}}
$$

  • æ‰©å±•åˆ°$k$ç»´ç©ºé—´åï¼Œç‚¹$X=(x_1,x_2,\dots,x_k)$åˆ°è¶…å¹³é¢$w^{T} x+b=0$è·ç¦»ä¸ºï¼š

$$
\frac{\left|\bf{w}^{T} \bf{x}+b\right|}{|\bf{w}|}
$$

  • å…¶ä¸­ï¼š

$$
|\bf{w}|=\sqrt{w_{1}^{2}+\ldots w_{n}^{2}}
$$

  • æˆ‘ä»¬å¸Œæœ›è¿™ä¸ªè¶…å¹³é¢å¯ä»¥åŒºåˆ†ä¸åŒä¸¤ç±»æ•°æ®ç‰¹å¾ï¼Œè¿™ä¸ªåˆ†ç±»å†³ç­–å‡½æ•°å°±æ˜¯ï¼š

$$
f(x)=\operatorname{sign}\left(\bf{w}^T\bf{x}+b\right)
$$

  • æˆ‘ä»¬çš„æ•°æ®ä¸º$({{\bf{x}}_i},{y_i}),i \in \{ 1,2, \ldots ,n\},y_i \in \{1,-1\} $ï¼Œå®šä¹‰ç‚¹$({{\bf{x}}_i},{y_i}) $åˆ°è¶…å¹³é¢çš„å‡½æ•°è·ç¦»$\hat{\gamma}_{i}$ï¼š
$$\hat{\gamma}_{i}=y_{i}\left(\bf{w} \cdot \bf{x}_{i}+b\right)$$
  • è€Œæˆ‘ä»¬çš„ç›®æ ‡æ˜¯æ‰¾åˆ°å¯ä»¥æœ€å¤§åŒ–æ•°æ®åˆ°ç‚¹å‡ ä½•è·ç¦»çš„è¶…å¹³é¢ï¼Œå°†å‡ ä½•è·ç¦»ç”¨${\gamma}_{i}$è¡¨ç¤ºï¼Œä¸ºï¼š
$$\gamma_{i}=|\frac{\bf{w}}{\|\bf{w}\|} \cdot \bf{x}_{i}+\frac{b}{\|\bf{w}\|}|=\frac{|\bf{w}^T\bf{x}_i+b|}{\|\bf{w}\|}=\frac{y_{i}\left(\bf{w} \cdot \bf{x}_{i}+b\right)}{\|\bf{w}\|}=\frac{\hat{\gamma}_{i}}{\|\bf{w}\|}$$
  • å› æ­¤ä¼˜åŒ–å‡½æ•°ä¸ºï¼š
$$\begin{array}{*{20}{l}}{\mathop {\max }\limits_{{\bf{w}},b} }&\gamma \\{{\rm{ s}}{\rm{.t}}{\rm{. }}}&{{y_i}\left( {\frac{{\bf{w}}}{{{||\bf{w}||}}} \cdot {x_i} + \frac{b}{{{||\bf{w}||}}}} \right) \ge \gamma ,\quad i = 1,2, \cdots ,n}\end{array}$$
  • æ ¹æ®å·²æœ‰ç»“è®ºå¯ä»¥å°†ä¼˜åŒ–å‡½æ•°è½¬åŒ–ä¸ºï¼š
$$\begin{array}{*{20}{l}}{\mathop {\max }\limits_{{\bf{w}},b} }&{\frac{{{{\hat \gamma }_i}}}{{{||\bf{w}||}}}}\\{{\rm{s}}.{\rm{t}}.}&{{y_i}\left( {{\bf{w}} \cdot {x_i} + b} \right) \ge {{\hat \gamma }_i},\quad i = 1,2, \cdots ,n}\end{array}$$- äº‹å®ä¸Šå‡½æ•°é—´éš”${\hat \gamma }$å¹¶ä¸å½±å“æœ€ä¼˜åŒ–é—®é¢˜çš„è§£ï¼Œå‡è®¾å°†$\bf{w}$å’Œ$b$æˆå€çš„æ”¹å˜ä¸º$a\bf{w}ï¼Œab$ï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆå‡½æ•°é—´éš”ä¹Ÿä¼šç›¸åº”å˜æˆ$a{\hat \gamma }$ï¼Œå› æ­¤ä¸ºç®€ä¾¿ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬å– ${\hat \gamma }=1$ï¼Œå› æ­¤ä¼˜åŒ–å‡½æ•°ä¸ºæœ€å¤§åŒ–$1/||\bf{w}||$ï¼Œè¿™ç­‰ä»·äºæœ€å°åŒ–$||\bf{w}||$ï¼Œè€ƒè™‘åˆ°æ±‚å¯¼æ–¹ä¾¿ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬æœ€å°åŒ–$1/2||\bf{w}||^2$- ä¼˜åŒ–å‡½æ•°æœ€ç»ˆä¸ºï¼š$$\begin{array}{*{20}{l}}{\mathop {\min }\limits_{{\bf{w}},b} }&{\frac{1}{2}||{\bf{w}}|{|^2}}\\{{\rm{s}}.{\rm{t}}.}&{{y_i}\left( {{\bf{w}} \cdot {{\bf{x}}_i} + b} \right) - 1 \ge 0,\quad i = 1,2, \cdots ,n}\end{array}$$

æ‹‰æ ¼æœ—æ—¥å¯¹å¶æ±‚æå€¼

  • å†™æˆæ‹‰æ ¼æœ—æ—¥ä¼˜åŒ–çš„æ ¼å¼ï¼š
$$\begin{array}{*{20}{l}}{\mathop {\min }\limits_{{\bf{w}},b} }&{\frac{1}{2}||{\bf{w}}|{|^2}}\\{{\rm{s}}.{\rm{t}}.}&1-{{y_i}\left( {{\bf{w}} \cdot {{\bf{x}}_i} + b} \right) \le 0,\quad i = 1,2, \cdots ,n}\end{array}$$
  • æ‹‰æ ¼æœ—æ—¥æ–¹ç¨‹ï¼š
$$L({\bf{w}},b,{\bf{\alpha }}) = \frac{1}{2}||{\bf{w}}|{|^2} + \sum\limits_{i = 1}^n {{\alpha _i}(1 - {y_i}\left( {{\bf{w}} \cdot {{\bf{x}}_i} + b} \right)} )$$
  • åŸå§‹é—®é¢˜ä¸ºå‡¸ä¼˜åŒ–é—®é¢˜ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬æŒ‰ç…§KKTæ¡ä»¶æ±‚è§£è¯¥é—®é¢˜çš„å¯¹å¶é—®é¢˜ï¼Œå³å¯æ ¹æ®å¼ºå¯¹å¶æ¡ä»¶è·å¾—åŸå§‹é—®é¢˜çš„è§£
  • å¯¹å¶é—®é¢˜ä¸ºï¼š
$$\mathop {max}\limits_{\bf{\alpha }} D({\bf{\alpha }}) = \mathop {max}\limits_{\bf{\alpha }} \mathop {\min }\limits_{{\bf{w}},b} L({\bf{w}},b,{\bf{\alpha }})$$
  • å…ˆæ±‚æœ€å°åŒ–æå€¼é—®é¢˜ $\mathop {\min }\limits_{{\bf{w}},b} L({\bf{w}},b,{\bf{\alpha }})$ï¼š
$$\left\{ {\begin{array}{*{20}{c}}{\frac{{\partial {\rm{L}}}}{{\partial {\bf{w}}}} = 0}\\{\frac{{\partial {\rm{L}}}}{{\partial b}} = 0}\end{array}} \right.$$
  • è§£å¾—ï¼š
$$\left\{ {\begin{array}{*{20}{c}}{{\bf{w}} = \sum\limits_{i = 1}^n {{\alpha _i}{y_i}{{\bf{x}}_i}} }\\{\sum\limits_{i = 1}^n {{\alpha _i}{y_i} = 0} }\end{array}} \right.$$
  • å¸¦å…¥$L({\bf{w}},b,{\bf{\alpha }})$å¾—ï¼š
$$\begin{aligned}L(\bf{w}, b, \bf{\alpha}) &=\frac{1}{2}\|\bf{w}\|^{2}+\sum_{i=1}^{n} \alpha_{i}\left[1-y_{i}\left(\bf{w}^{T} x_{i}+b\right)\right] \\&=\frac{1}{2} \bf{w}^{T} \bf{w}-\bf{w}^{T} \sum_{i=1}^{n} \alpha_{i} y_{i} x_{i}-b \sum_{i=1}^{n} \alpha_{i} y_{i}+\sum_{i=1}^{n} \alpha_{i} \\&=\frac{1}{2} \bf{w}^{T} \sum_{i=1}^{n} \alpha_{i} y_{i} x_{i}-\bf{w}^{T^{\prime}} \sum_{i=1}^{n} \alpha_{i} x_{i} y_{i}-b * 0+\sum_{i=1}^{n} \alpha_{i} \\&=\sum_{i=1}^{n} \alpha_{i}-\frac{1}{2}\left(\sum_{i=1}^{n} \alpha_{i} y_{i} x_{i}\right)^{T} \sum_{i=1}^{n} \alpha_{i} y_{i} x_{i} \\&=\sum_{i=1}^{n} \alpha_{i}-\frac{1}{2} \sum_{i, j=1}^{n} \alpha_{i} \alpha_{j} y_{i} y_{j} x_{i}^{T} x_{j}\end{aligned}$$
  • æ­¤æ—¶æˆ‘ä»¬éœ€è¦è§£å†³çš„ä¼˜åŒ–é—®é¢˜æ˜¯ï¼š
$$\begin{array}{*{20}{c}}{\mathop {\max }\limits_{\bf{\alpha }} \sum\limits_{i = 1}^n {{\alpha _i}} - \frac{1}{2}\sum\limits_{i,j = 1}^n {{\alpha _i}} {\alpha _j}{y_i}{y_j}{\bf{x}}_i^T{{\bf{x}}_j}}\\{\qquad \begin{array}{*{20}{c}}{{\rm{ s}}{\rm{.t}}{\rm{. }}{\alpha _i} \ge 0,\quad i = 1,2, \ldots ,n}\\{\sum\limits_{i = 1}^n {{\alpha _i}} {y_i} = 0}\end{array}}\end{array}$$

  • å¯ä»¥çœ‹åˆ°é€šè¿‡æ‹‰æ ¼æœ—æ—¥å¯¹å¶ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬å°†åŸå§‹æ‹‰æ ¼æœ—æ—¥æ–¹ç¨‹$k+1+n$ä¸ªæœªçŸ¥æ•°ã€$n$ä¸ªå¤æ‚ä¸ç­‰å¼çº¦æŸæ¡ä»¶çš„ä¼˜åŒ–é—®é¢˜è½¬æ¢ä¸ºäº†$n$ä¸ªæœªçŸ¥æ•°ï¼Œ1ä¸ªç­‰å¼çº¦æŸçš„é—®é¢˜ï¼Œå½“ç„¶æ»¡è¶³KKTæ¡ä»¶æ˜¯å‰æ

  • å¯¹äºè¿™ä¸ªé—®é¢˜ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬æœ‰æ›´é«˜æ•ˆçš„ä¼˜åŒ–ç®—æ³•ï¼Œå³åºåˆ—æœ€å°ä¼˜åŒ–ï¼ˆSMOï¼‰ç®—æ³•ã€‚æˆ‘ä»¬é€šè¿‡è¿™ä¸ªä¼˜åŒ–ç®—æ³•èƒ½å¾—åˆ°$\bf{Î±}$ï¼Œå†æ ¹æ®$\bf{Î±}$ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬å°±å¯ä»¥æ±‚è§£å‡º$\bf{w}$å’Œ$b$ï¼Œè¿›è€Œæ±‚å¾—æˆ‘ä»¬æœ€åˆçš„ç›®çš„ï¼šæ‰¾åˆ°è¶…å¹³é¢ï¼Œå³"å†³ç­–å¹³é¢"ã€‚

å‚è€ƒèµ„æ–™

  • https://www.pianshen.com/article/15821257925/

  • https://blog.csdn.net/qq_40778406/article/details/79879434

entry.title: ä»æœåŠ¡å™¨æ˜ å°„ jupyter åˆ°æœ¬æœºåº”ç”¨

Jupyter Notebookæ˜¯åŸºäºç½‘é¡µçš„ç”¨äºäº¤äº’è®¡ç®—çš„åº”ç”¨ç¨‹åºï¼Œæ–¹ä¾¿æ˜“ç”¨ï¼Œæœ¬æ–‡è®°å½•å°†è¿œç¨‹jupyterç¯å¢ƒæ˜ å°„åˆ°æœ¬æœºçš„æ–¹æ³•ã€‚

ç®€ä»‹

Jupyter Notebookæ˜¯åŸºäºç½‘é¡µçš„ç”¨äºäº¤äº’è®¡ç®—çš„åº”ç”¨ç¨‹åºã€‚å…¶å¯è¢«åº”ç”¨äºå…¨è¿‡ç¨‹è®¡ç®—ï¼šå¼€å‘ã€æ–‡æ¡£ç¼–å†™ã€è¿è¡Œä»£ç å’Œå±•ç¤ºç»“æœã€‚â€”â€”Jupyter Notebookå®˜æ–¹ä»‹ç»

ç®€è€Œè¨€ä¹‹ï¼ŒJupyter Notebookæ˜¯ä»¥ç½‘é¡µçš„å½¢å¼æ‰“å¼€ï¼Œå¯ä»¥åœ¨ç½‘é¡µé¡µé¢ä¸­ç›´æ¥ç¼–å†™ä»£ç å’Œè¿è¡Œä»£ç ï¼Œä»£ç çš„è¿è¡Œç»“æœä¹Ÿä¼šç›´æ¥åœ¨ä»£ç å—ä¸‹æ˜¾ç¤ºã€‚å¦‚åœ¨ç¼–ç¨‹è¿‡ç¨‹ä¸­éœ€è¦ç¼–å†™è¯´æ˜æ–‡æ¡£ï¼Œå¯åœ¨åŒä¸€ä¸ªé¡µé¢ä¸­ç›´æ¥ç¼–å†™ï¼Œä¾¿äºä½œåŠæ—¶çš„è¯´æ˜å’Œè§£é‡Šã€‚

entry.title: æ‹‰æ ¼æœ—æ—¥å¯¹å¶é—®é¢˜
entry.content:
åœ¨å‰æ–‡äº†è§£è¿‡æ‹‰æ ¼æœ—æ—¥ä¹˜æ•°æ³•åï¼Œè¿›ä¸€æ­¥ä»‹ç»æ‹‰æ ¼æœ—æ—¥å¯¹å¶ã€‚

èƒŒæ™¯ä¿¡æ¯

åœ¨çº¦æŸæœ€ä¼˜åŒ–é—®é¢˜ä¸­ï¼Œå¸¸å¸¸åˆ©ç”¨æ‹‰æ ¼æœ—æ—¥å¯¹å¶æ€§ï¼ˆLagrange dualityï¼‰å°†åŸå§‹é—®é¢˜è½¬æ¢ä¸ºå¯¹å¶é—®é¢˜ï¼Œé€šè¿‡è§£å¯¹å¶é—®é¢˜è€Œå¾—åˆ°åŸå§‹é—®é¢˜çš„è§£ã€‚

  • æ‹‰æ ¼æœ—æ—¥å¯¹å¶æ˜¯åœ¨æ‹‰æ ¼æœ—æ—¥ä¹˜æ•°æ³•åŸºç¡€ä¹‹ä¸Šï¼Œé€šè¿‡å˜æ¢åŸå§‹é—®é¢˜çš„æ±‚è§£å½¢å¼å¾—åˆ°çš„ç›¸å¯¹äºåŸå§‹ä¼˜åŒ–é—®é¢˜çš„å¦ä¸€ä¸ªä¼˜åŒ–é—®é¢˜

åŸå§‹ä¼˜åŒ–é—®é¢˜

å‡è®¾$f(x)$, $c_i(x)$, $h_j(x)$ æ˜¯å®šä¹‰åœ¨$\mathbf{R}^{n}$ä¸Šçš„è¿ç»­å¯å¾®å‡½æ•°ï¼Œè€ƒè™‘çº¦æŸæœ€ä¼˜åŒ–é—®é¢˜ï¼š

$$\begin{array}{c}\min _{x \in \mathbf{R}^{n}} f(x) \\\text { s.t. } \quad h_{i}(x) \leq 0, i=1,2, \ldots, k \\g_{j}(x)=0, j=1,2, \ldots, l\end{array}\tag{1} \label{eq1}$$
  • å®šä¹‰æ­¤é—®é¢˜ä¸ºåŸå§‹ä¼˜åŒ–é—®é¢˜

å¹¿ä¹‰æ‹‰æ ¼æœ—æ—¥å‡½æ•°

æ¥æºè§ ï¼šæ‹‰æ ¼æœ—æ—¥ä¹˜æ•°æ³•

$$
L(x, \alpha, \beta)=f(x)+\sum_{i=1}^{k} \alpha_{i} h_{i}(x)+\sum_{j=1}^{l} \beta_{j} g_{j}(x)\tag{2} \label{eq2}
$$

  • å…¶ä¸­ $x=\left(x_1, x_2, \ldots, x_n\right)^{T} \in \mathbf{R}^{n} , \alpha_{i}, \beta_{j}$æ˜¯æ‹‰æ ¼æœ—æ—¥ä¹˜å­ï¼Œä¸”$\alpha_{i} \geq 0$

æ‹‰æ ¼æœ—æ—¥å¯¹å¶çš„æ¥æº

è€ƒè™‘åŸå§‹ä¼˜åŒ–é—®é¢˜$\eqref{eq1}$

  • æƒ³è¦æ±‚å¾—$f(x)$çš„æœ€å°å€¼ï¼Œä¹Ÿå°±æ˜¯è¦æ±‚$f(x)$çš„æœ€å¤§ä¸‹ç•Œ
  • å¯¹äºæ–¹ç¨‹ç»„ï¼š

$$
\begin{array}{l}
f(\mathbf{x})<v \\
h_{i}(\mathbf{x}) \leq 0, i=1,2, \ldots, k
\end{array} \tag{3} \label{eq3}
$$

  • è‹¥æ–¹ç¨‹ç»„$\eqref{eq3}$æ— è§£ï¼Œåˆ™$v$æ˜¯$f(x)$çš„ä¸€ä¸ªä¸‹ç•Œï¼Œä¹Ÿå°±æ˜¯è¯´å¦‚æœæœ‰æ¸ é“å¯ä»¥åˆ©ç”¨åˆ°æ–¹ç¨‹ç»„$\eqref{eq3}$æ— è§£ï¼Œåˆ™å¯ä»¥åˆ©ç”¨å…¶é™åˆ¶$f(x)$çš„ä¸‹ç•Œ
  • æ³¨æ„åˆ°è‹¥æ–¹ç¨‹ç»„$\eqref{eq3}$æœ‰è§£ï¼Œå¯ä»¥æ¨å‡ºå¯¹äºä»»æ„$\lambda \ge 0$ï¼š

$$
f(\mathbf{x})+\sum_{i=1}^{k} \lambda_{i} h_{i}(\mathbf{x})<v \tag{4} \label{eq4}
$$

  • æ–¹ç¨‹$\eqref{eq4}$æœ‰è§£
  • å³å‘½é¢˜ï¼šif æ–¹ç¨‹ç»„$\eqref{eq3}$æœ‰è§£ then æ–¹ç¨‹$\eqref{eq4}$æœ‰è§£ æˆç«‹
  • åˆ™å…¶é€†å¦å‘½é¢˜ **if æ–¹ç¨‹$\eqref{eq4}$æ— è§£ then æ–¹ç¨‹ç»„$\eqref{eq3}$æ— è§£ ** æˆç«‹
  • è€Œ æ–¹ç¨‹$\eqref{eq4}$æ— è§£ çš„å……è¦ï¼ˆç­‰ä»·ï¼‰æ¡ä»¶æ˜¯ï¼š
$$\min _{ \mathbf{x} } f ( \mathbf {x} ) + \sum _ { i=1 } ^ {k} \lambda_{i} g_{i} ( \mathbf {x}) \geq v \tag{5} \label{eq5}$$
  • æ–¹ç¨‹$\eqref{eq5}$çš„è‡ªå˜é‡ä¸º$\lambda_i$ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬çš„ç›®æ ‡æ˜¯è¦æ‰¾åˆ°å…¶ä¸Šç•Œ$v_{max}$ï¼Œå› æ­¤æœ‰ï¼š
$$v_{max}=\max _{\boldsymbol{\lambda} \geq \mathbf{0}} \min _{\mathbf{x}} f(\mathbf{x})+\sum_{i=1}^{k} \lambda_{i} g_{i}(\mathbf{x}) \tag{6} \label{eq6}$$
  • æ–¹ç¨‹$\eqref{eq6}$å³ä¸ºæ‹‰æ ¼æœ—æ—¥å¯¹å¶é—®é¢˜çš„æ ¸å¿ƒï¼Œå»¶ç»­åŸå§‹é—®é¢˜çš„æ ‡è®°ï¼Œè®°ä¸ºï¼š
$$\mathop {\max }\limits_{\alpha \cdot \beta ;{\alpha _i} \ge 0}D(\alpha ,\beta ) = \mathop {\max }\limits_{\alpha \cdot \beta ;{\alpha _i} \ge 0} \mathop {\min }\limits_x L(x,\alpha ,\beta )\tag{7} \label{eq7}$$

å¯ä»¥è¯´å¯¹å¶é—®é¢˜å°±æ˜¯ä»å¦ä¸€ä¸ªæ–¹å‘é€¼è¿‘$f(x)$æœ€å°å€¼çš„é—®é¢˜

å¯¹å¶é—®é¢˜çš„æ€§è´¨

ä¹‹æ‰€ä»¥å¼•å…¥å¦ä¸€ä¸ªä¼˜åŒ–é—®é¢˜æ˜¯å› ä¸ºå¯¹å¶é—®é¢˜ä¹‹é—´æœ‰ç€è‰¯å¥½çš„æ€§è´¨

  • å¯¹å¶é—®é¢˜çš„å¯¹å¶æ˜¯åŸé—®é¢˜ï¼›
  • æ— è®ºåŸå§‹é—®é¢˜æ˜¯å¦æ˜¯å‡¸çš„ï¼Œå¯¹å¶é—®é¢˜éƒ½æ˜¯å‡¸ä¼˜åŒ–é—®é¢˜ï¼›
  • å¯¹å¶é—®é¢˜å¯ä»¥ç»™å‡ºåŸå§‹é—®é¢˜ä¸€ä¸ªä¸‹ç•Œï¼›
  • å½“æ»¡è¶³ä¸€å®šæ¡ä»¶æ—¶ï¼ŒåŸå§‹é—®é¢˜ä¸å¯¹å¶é—®é¢˜çš„è§£æ˜¯å®Œå…¨ç­‰ä»·çš„ï¼›

æ‹‰æ ¼æœ—æ—¥å¯¹å¶é—®é¢˜çš„å‡¹å‡½æ•°æ€§è´¨è¯æ˜

æŒ‰ç…§å®šä¹‰

å¯¹å¶é—®é¢˜æœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªå¾ˆå¥½çš„æ€§è´¨æ˜¯å¯¹å¶å‡½æ•°ä¸ºå‡¹å‡½æ•°ï¼Œè¯æ˜å¦‚ä¸‹

  • å‘½é¢˜ æ‹‰æ ¼æœ—æ—¥å¯¹å¶å‡½æ•°ä¸€å®šæ˜¯å‡¹å‡½æ•°ï¼Œä¸”å…¶å‡¹æ€§ä¸æœ€ä¼˜åŒ–å‡½æ•°å’Œçº¦æŸå‡½æ•°æ— å…³ã€‚
  • è€ƒè™‘å¯¹å¶é—®é¢˜$\eqref{eq7}$ï¼ŒæŒ‰ç…§å‡¹å‡½æ•°å®šä¹‰ï¼Œå¾€è¯ï¼š

$$
D(\theta {\alpha _1} + (1 - \theta ){\alpha _2},\theta {\beta _1} + (1 - \theta ){\beta _2}) \ge \theta D({\alpha _1},{\beta _1}) + (1 - \theta )D({\alpha _2},{\beta _2}) \tag{8} \label{eq8}
$$

  • æœ‰ï¼š
$$\begin{array}{l}&D(\theta {\alpha _1} + (1 - \theta ){\alpha _2},\theta {\beta _1} + (1 - \theta ){\beta _2}) \\&= \mathop {\min }\limits_x L(x,\theta {\alpha _1} + (1 - \theta ){\alpha _2},\theta {\beta _1} + (1 - \theta ){\beta _2})\\ &= \mathop {\min }\limits_x (f(x) + \sum\limits_{i = 1}^k {(\theta {\alpha _{1,i}} + (1 - \theta ){\alpha _{2,i}})} {h_i}(x) + \sum\limits_{j = 1}^l {(\theta {\beta _{1,j}} + (1 - \theta ){\beta _{2,j}})} {g_j}(x)\\ &= \mathop {\min }\limits_x (\theta (f(x) + \sum\limits_{i = 1}^k {{\alpha _{1,i}}} {h_i}(x) + \sum\limits_{j = 1}^l {{\beta _{1,j}}} {g_j}(x)) + (1 - \theta )(f(x) + \sum\limits_{i = 1}^k {{\alpha _{2,i}}} {h_i}(x) + \sum\limits_{j = 1}^l {{\beta _{2,j}}} {g_j}(x)))\\ &\ge \theta \mathop {\min }\limits_x (f(x) + \sum\limits_{i = 1}^k {{\alpha _{1,i}}} {h_i}(x) + \sum\limits_{j = 1}^l {{\beta _{1,j}}} {g_j}(x)) + (1 - \theta )\mathop {\min }\limits_x (f(x) + \sum\limits_{i = 1}^k {{\alpha _{2,i}}} {h_i}(x) + \sum\limits_{j = 1}^l {{\beta _{2,j}}} {g_j}(x))\\ &= \theta D({\alpha _1},{\beta _1}) + (1 - \theta )D({\alpha _2},{\beta _2})\end{array} \tag{9} \label{eq9}$$

  • å…¶ä¸­$\eqref{eq9}$çš„ä¸ç­‰å¼æ¥æºäºï¼š

    • å¯¹äºå®æ•°é›†åˆ$\bf{a},\bf{b}$ï¼š
    $$ \begin{array}{l} a=\left\{a_{1}, a_{2}, \cdots, a_{n}\right\} \\ b=\left\{b_{1}, b_{2}, \cdots, b_{n}\right\} \end{array} \tag{10} $$
    • å¯¹äºä»»æ„$i$ï¼Œæœ‰ï¼š
    $$ \mathop {\min }\limits_i \left\{ {{a_i} + {b_i}} \right\} \ge \min \{ {\bf{a}}\} + \min \{ {\bf{b}}\} ,\quad i \in {N^ + } \tag{11} $$

  • åŸå‘½é¢˜å¾—è¯ã€‚

ä»¿å°„å‡½æ•°

å¦ä¸€ç§æ€è·¯æ˜¯è®¨è®º$\eqref{eq2}$çš„åä¸¤é¡¹å†…å®¹

  • å› ä¸ºå¯¹å¶é—®é¢˜ä¸­$x$è§†ä½œå¸¸æ•°ï¼Œ$\alpha,\beta$ä¸ºè‡ªå˜é‡ï¼Œå¯ä»¥è§†ä½œï¼š
$$\begin{array}{l}D(\alpha ,\beta {\rm{|x}}) &= f(x) + \sum\limits_{i = 1}^k {{\alpha _i}} {h_i}(x) + \sum\limits_{j = 1}^l {{\beta _j}} {g_j}(x)\\ &= A + \sum\limits_{i = 1}^k {{\alpha _i}} {B_i} + \sum\limits_{j = 1}^l {{\beta _j}} {C_j} \end{array} \tag{12}$$
  • å› æ­¤$D(\alpha, \beta)$æ˜¯è°ƒæ•´å¸¸æ•°$A,B,C$çš„ä»¿å°„å‡½æ•°ï¼Œä»¿å°„å‡½æ•°æ—¢å‡¸ä¸”å‡¹ï¼Œå› æ­¤æ‹‰æ ¼æœ—æ—¥å¯¹å¶é—®é¢˜å…·æœ‰å‡¹å‡½æ•°æ€§è´¨

æ‹‰æ ¼æœ—æ—¥å¯¹å¶

åŸå§‹é—®é¢˜

  • è€ƒè™‘$x$çš„å‡½æ•°ï¼š
$$P(x)=\max _{\alpha, \beta ; \alpha_{i} \geq 0} L(x, \alpha, \beta) \tag{13}$$

è¿™é‡Œï¼Œ$P$è¡¨ç¤ºåŸå§‹é—®é¢˜ã€‚å°†ä¸Šå¼çœ‹åš$x$ çš„å‡½æ•°ã€‚

ç­‰å¼å³è¾¹å¯ä»¥çœ‹åšå›ºå®š$x$ çš„æƒ…å†µä¸‹ï¼Œæ±‚å…³äº$\alpha, \beta$çš„å‡½æ•° $L $çš„æœ€å¤§å€¼çš„é—®é¢˜ã€‚

  • å¯ä»¥æ¨å‡ºï¼š
$$P(x)=\left\{\begin{array}{l}f(x), x \text { æ»¡è¶³åŸå§‹é—®é¢˜çº¦æŸ } \\+\infty, \text { otherwise }\end{array}\right. \tag{14}$$
  • è€ƒè™‘æå°åŒ–é—®é¢˜ï¼š

$$

$$

  • å¼$\eqref{eq15}$ä¸$\eqref{eq7}$ç­‰ä»·ï¼Œå› ä¸ºå›ºå®š$x$æ—¶å‰©ä½™ä¸¤é¡¹åœ¨çº¦æŸèŒƒå›´å†…æœ€å¤§å€¼ä¸º0ï¼Œç›¸å½“äºåœ¨çº¦æŸèŒƒå›´å†…æ±‚è§£$f(x)$çš„æœ€å°å€¼ã€‚

$$

å¯¹å¶é—®é¢˜

  • å»¶ç»­ä¸Šæ–‡çš„å¯¹å¶é—®é¢˜$\eqref{eq7}$
  • å¯ä»¥çœ‹åˆ°äº‹å®ä¸Šå¯¹å¶é—®é¢˜ä¸åŸé—®é¢˜ä¸ºæå¤§æå°çš„æ±‚è§£é¡ºåºé—®é¢˜
  • å®šä¹‰å¯¹å¶é—®é¢˜çš„å€¼ï¼š
$$d^{*}=\max _{\alpha, \beta ; \alpha_{i} \geq 0} D(\alpha, \beta) \tag{17}$$

åŸå§‹é—®é¢˜ä¸å¯¹å¶é—®é¢˜çš„å…³ç³»

  • å¯¹å¶é—®é¢˜çš„è§£ä¸å¤§äºåŸå§‹é—®é¢˜çš„è§£ï¼š
  • è¯æ˜ï¼š

$$

\mathrm{d}^{}=\max {\mathrm{a}, \mathrm{B}: \mathrm{a}{i} \geqslant 0} \min _{\mathrm{x}} L(x, \mathrm{a}, \beta) \leqslant \min _{\mathrm{x}} \max {\mathrm{a}, \mathrm{\beta}: \mathrm{a}{i} \geqslant 0} L(x, \mathrm{a}, \beta)=\mathrm{p}^{}\
d ^ { * } \le p ^ { * }
\end{array}\tag{18}
$$

  • è¯¥æ€§è´¨ä¸ºå¼±å¯¹å¶æ€§ï¼ˆweak dualityï¼‰ï¼Œè¯¥æ€§è´¨åœ¨ä»»ä½•æƒ…å†µä¸‹éƒ½æˆç«‹
  • ä¹Ÿå› ä¸ºå¼±å¯¹å¶çš„å­˜åœ¨ï¼Œä½¿å¾— å¯¹å¶é—®é¢˜å¯ä»¥ç»™å‡ºåŸå§‹é—®é¢˜çš„ä¸‹ç•Œ
  • ä¸å¼±å¯¹å¶æ€§ç›¸å¯¹åº”çš„æ˜¯å¼ºå¯¹å¶æ€§ï¼ˆstrong dualityï¼‰ï¼Œå³ï¼š

æ¦‚è¿°

  • äº‹å®ä¸Šå¦‚æœæˆ‘ä»¬å¯ä»¥é€šè¿‡gå¾—åˆ°æŸä¸ªå˜é‡çš„è¡¨ç¤ºï¼Œä¾‹å¦‚$x_1 = h(x_2, â€¦, x_n)$ï¼Œå°†è¯¥å¼å¸¦å…¥$y$å³å¯æŠ“æ¢ä¸ºæ— çº¦æŸä¼˜åŒ–ï¼ˆåˆé«˜ä¸­å°±æ˜¯è¿™ä¹ˆåšçš„ï¼Œæ‰€è°“æ¶ˆå…ƒæ³•æ˜¯ä¹Ÿï¼‰ï¼Œä½†æœ‰çš„æ—¶å€™æˆ‘ä»¬æ— æ³•å¾—åˆ°è¿™æ ·çš„è¡¨ç¤ºï¼Œä¾¿éœ€è¦å€ŸåŠ©æ‹‰æ ¼æœ—æ—¥ä¹˜æ•°æ³•æ¥é¿å…æ¶ˆå…ƒæ³•çš„å›°å¢ƒã€‚

æ€æƒ³

  • è€ƒè™‘äºŒå…ƒå‡½æ•°$f(x,y)$ï¼Œåœ¨çº¦æŸ$g(x,y)=c$ä¸‹çš„æå€¼
  • é¦–å…ˆæˆ‘ä»¬å¯ä»¥ç»˜åˆ¶å‡º$f(x,y)$çš„ä¸€å±‚å±‚ç­‰é«˜çº¿ï¼Œå½“ç­‰é«˜çº¿ä¸$g(x,y)=c$ç›¸åˆ‡æ—¶å³å¯èƒ½æ˜¯è¯¥é—®é¢˜çš„æå€¼ç‚¹

æ‹‰æ ¼æœ—æ—¥ä¹˜æ•°æ³•

å•ä¸ªç­‰å¼çº¦æŸ

è€ƒè™‘$n$å…ƒå‡½æ•°$y=f(x_1, x_2,â€¦,x_n)$ï¼Œåœ¨ç­‰å¼çº¦æŸ$g(x_1, x_2,â€¦,x_n)=0$ ä¸‹çš„æå€¼ç‚¹æ±‚è§£é—®é¢˜

  • åœ¨æå€¼ç‚¹ï¼Œå¿…æœ‰$y$å’Œ$g$æ³•å‘é‡å¹³è¡Œ
  • $y$çš„æ³•å‘é‡ä¸ºï¼š
$$[ rac{{\partial y}}{{\partial {x_1}}}, rac{{\partial y}}{{\partial {x_2}}},..., rac{{\partial y}}{{\partial {x_n}}}]$$

$$X = \left[ {\begin{array}{*{20}{c}}{{x_{11}}}&{{x_{12}}}& \cdots &{{x_{1n}}}\\{{x_{21}}}&{{x_{22}}}&{}&{{x_{2n}}}\\\vdots &{}& \ddots & \vdots \\{{x_{m1}}}&{{x_{m2}}}& \cdots &{{x_{mn}}}\end{array}} \right]$$

$$U^T{\Sigma _X}U = \Sigma$$$$\Sigma = {U^T}(X - {\mu _X}){(X - {\mu _X})^T}U$$$$\Sigma = ({U^T}X - {U^T}{\mu _X}){({U^T}X - {U^T}{\mu _X})^T}$$

$$

$$

$$E (X,Y)=\iint x y f(x, y) d x d y=\iint x y g(x) h(y) d x d y=\int x g(x) d x \int y h(y) d y=E (X) E(Y)$$

$$Cov(x_i,x_j)=0,i \ne j$$$$x_i \sim N\left(\mu_i, \sigma_i^{2}\right)$$

$${\bf{\Sigma }} = \left( {\begin{array}{*{20}{c}}{\sigma _1^2}&{}&{}&{}\\{}&{\sigma _2^2}&{}&{}\\{}&{}& \ddots &{}\\{}&{}&{}&{\sigma _n^2}\end{array}} \right)$$

$$\begin{aligned}f\left( {{x_1},{x_x} \ldots ,{x_n}} \right) &= \frac{1}{{\sqrt {{{\left( {2\pi } \right)}^n}} \prod\limits_{i = 1}^n {{\sigma _i}} }}{e^{ - \frac{1}{2}{{({\bf{X}} - {\bf{\mu }})}^T}\left( {\begin{array}{*{20}{c}}{\frac{1}{{\sigma _1^2}}}&{}&{}&{}\\{}&{\frac{1}{{\sigma _2^2}}}&{}&{}\\{}&{}& \ddots &{}\\{}&{}&{}&{\frac{1}{{\sigma _n^2}}}\\\end{array}} \right)({\bf{X}} - {\bf{\mu }})}}\\ &= \frac{1}{{\sqrt {{{\left( {2\pi } \right)}^n}} \prod\limits_{i = 1}^n {{\sigma _i}} }}{e^{ - \frac{1}{2}[\frac{{{x_1} - {\mu _1}}}{{\sigma _1^2}},\frac{{{x_2} - {\mu _2}}}{{\sigma _2^2}},...,\frac{{{x_n} - {\mu _n}}}{{\sigma _n^2}}]({\bf{X}} - {\bf{\mu }})}}\\ & = \frac{1}{{\sqrt {{{\left( {2\pi } \right)}^n}} \prod\limits_{i = 1}^n {{\sigma _i}} }}{e^{ - \frac{1}{2}\sum\limits_{i = 1}^n {\frac{{{{({x_n} - {\mu _n})}^2}}}{{\sigma _n^2}}} }}\\ & = \prod\limits_{i = 1}^n {\frac{1}{{\sqrt {2\pi } {\sigma _i}}}} {e^{ - \frac{1}{2}\frac{{{{({x_i} - {\mu _i})}^2}}}{{\sigma _i^2}}}}\\ & = \prod\limits_{i = 1}^n {f({x_i})} \end{aligned}$$

Mahalanobis)æå‡ºçš„ï¼Œè¡¨ç¤ºç‚¹ä¸ä¸€ä¸ªåˆ†å¸ƒä¹‹é—´çš„è·ç¦»ã€‚å®ƒæ˜¯ä¸€ç§æœ‰æ•ˆçš„è®¡ç®—ä¸¤ä¸ªæœªçŸ¥æ ·æœ¬é›†çš„ç›¸ä¼¼åº¦çš„æ–¹æ³•ã€‚ä¸æ¬§æ°è·ç¦»ä¸åŒçš„æ˜¯ï¼Œå®ƒè€ƒè™‘åˆ°å„ç§ç‰¹æ€§ä¹‹é—´çš„è”ç³»ï¼Œæœ¬æ–‡ä»‹ç»é©¬æ°è·ç¦»ç›¸å…³å†…å®¹ã€‚

æ¬§æ°è·ç¦»çš„ç¼ºç‚¹

è·ç¦»åº¦é‡åœ¨å„ä¸ªå­¦ç§‘ä¸­æœ‰ç€å¹¿æ³›ç”¨é€”ï¼Œå½“æ•°æ®è¡¨ç¤ºä¸ºå‘é‡$\overrightarrow{\mathbf{x} }=\left(x_{1}, x_{2}, \cdots, x_{n}\right)^{T}$å’Œ$\overrightarrow{\mathbf{y}}=\left(y_{1}, y_{2}, \cdots, y_{n}\right)^{T}$æ—¶ï¼Œæœ€ç›´è§‚çš„è·ç¦»åº¦é‡å°±æ˜¯æ¬§å¼è·ç¦»äº†ï¼š

$$d(x, y):=\sqrt{\left(x_{1}-y_{1}\right)^{2}+\left(x_{2}-y_{2}\right)^{2}+\cdots+\left(x_{n}-y_{n}\right)^{2}}=\sqrt{\sum_{i=1}^{n}\left(x_{i}-y_{i}\right)^{2}}$$

ä½†æ˜¯è¿™ç§åº¦é‡æ–¹å¼æ²¡æœ‰è€ƒè™‘åˆ°å„ä¸ªç»´åº¦ä¹‹é—´çš„å·®å¼‚å’Œç›¸å…³ç­‰å› ç´ ï¼Œä¸åŒçš„å‘é‡åº¦é‡è·ç¦»æ—¶æƒé‡éƒ½ç›¸åŒï¼Œè¿™å¯èƒ½ä¼šå¯¹ç»“æœå¯ä¿¡åº¦äº§ç”Ÿå¹²æ‰°ã€‚

é©¬æ°è·ç¦»

åº¦é‡æ ·æœ¬è·ç¦»æŸä¸ªåˆ†å¸ƒçš„è·ç¦»ï¼Œå…ˆå°†æ ·æœ¬ä¸åˆ†å¸ƒæ ‡å‡†åŒ–åˆ°å¤šç»´æ ‡å‡†æ­£æ€åˆ†å¸ƒååº¦é‡æ¬§å¼è·ç¦»

æ€æƒ³

  • å°†å˜é‡æŒ‰ç…§ä¸»æˆåˆ†è¿›è¡Œæ—‹è½¬ï¼Œæ¶ˆé™¤ç»´åº¦é—´çš„ç›¸å…³æ€§
  • å¯¹å‘é‡å’Œåˆ†å¸ƒè¿›è¡Œæ ‡å‡†åŒ–ï¼Œè®©å„ä¸ªç»´åº¦åŒä¸ºæ ‡å‡†æ­£æ€åˆ†å¸ƒ

æ¨å¯¼

  • åˆ†å¸ƒç”±$n$ä¸ª$m$ç»´å‘é‡åˆ»ç”»ï¼Œå³å…±$n$æ¡æ•°æ®ï¼Œæ¯æ¡æ•°æ®ç”±ä¸€ä¸ª$m$ç»´å‘é‡è¡¨ç¤ºï¼š
$$X = \left[ {\begin{array}{*{20}{c}}{{x_{11}}}&{{x_{12}}}& \cdots &{{x_{1n}}}\\{{x_{21}}}&{{x_{22}}}&{}&{{x_{2n}}}\\\vdots &{}& \ddots & \vdots \\{{x_{m1}}}&{{x_{m2}}}& \cdots &{{x_{mn}}}\end{array}} \right]$$
  • $X$çš„å‡å€¼ä¸º${\mu _X}$
  • $X$çš„åæ–¹å·®çŸ©é˜µä¸º:

$$
\sum\nolimits_X = \frac{1}{n}(X - {\mu _X}){(X - {\mu _X})^T}
$$

  • ä¸ºæ¶ˆé™¤ç»´åº¦é—´çš„ç›¸å…³æ€§ï¼Œé€šè¿‡ä¸€ä¸ª$m \times m$çš„çŸ©é˜µ$Q^T$å¯¹$X$è¿›è¡Œåæ ‡è¡¨æ¢ï¼Œå°†æ•°æ®æ˜ å°„åˆ°æ–°çš„åæ ‡ç³»ä¸‹ï¼Œç”¨$Y$è¡¨ç¤ºï¼š

$$
Y=Q^TX
$$

æ­¤æ—¶æˆ‘ä»¬æœŸæœ›åœ¨$Q^T$çš„ä½œç”¨ä¸‹ï¼Œ$Y$ çš„å‘é‡è¡¨ç¤ºä¸­ï¼Œä¸åŒç»´åº¦ä¹‹é—´æ˜¯ç›¸äº’ç‹¬ç«‹çš„ï¼Œæ­¤æ—¶$Y$ çš„åæ–¹å·®çŸ©é˜µåº”è¯¥æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªå¯¹è§’çŸ©é˜µï¼ˆé™¤å¯¹è§’çº¿å…ƒç´ å¤–ï¼Œå…¶ä½™å…ƒç´ å‡ä¸º0ï¼‰ã€‚

  • Y çš„å‡å€¼ï¼š$u_{Y}=Q^{T} u_{X}$
  • Y çš„åæ–¹å·®çŸ©é˜µï¼š
$$\begin{aligned}\Sigma_{Y} &=\frac{1}{n}\left[Y-u_{Y}\right]\left[y-u_{Y}\right]^{T} \\&=\frac{1}{n}\left[Q^{T}\left(X-u_{x}\right)\right]\left[Q^{T}\left(X-u_{X}\right)\right]^{T} \\&=Q^{T} \frac{1}{n}\left(X-u_{X}\right)\left(X-u_{X}\right)^{T} Q \\&=Q^{T} \Sigma_{X} Q\end{aligned}$$

  • ä»è¿™é‡Œå¯ä»¥å‘ç°ï¼Œå½“ $Q $æ˜¯$\Sigma_{X}$çš„ç‰¹å¾å‘é‡ç»„æˆçš„çŸ©é˜µæ—¶ï¼Œ$\Sigma_{Y}$ ä¸€å®šæ˜¯å¯¹è§’çŸ©é˜µï¼Œä¸”å€¼ä¸ºæ¯ä¸ªç‰¹å¾å‘é‡å¯¹åº”çš„ç‰¹å¾å€¼ã€‚ç”±äº$\Sigma_{X}$æ˜¯å¯¹ç§°çŸ©é˜µï¼Œå› æ­¤è‚¯å®šå¯ä»¥é€šè¿‡ç‰¹å¾åˆ†è§£å¾—åˆ° $Q$ ï¼Œä¸” $Q$ æ˜¯æ­£äº¤çŸ©é˜µã€‚

  • $\Sigma_{Y}$çš„å¯¹è§’çº¿å…ƒç´ å«ä¹‰ä¸º$Y$ä¸­æ¯ä¸ªå‘é‡çš„æ–¹å·®ï¼Œå› æ­¤å‡ä¸ºéè´Ÿå€¼ï¼Œä»è¿™ä¸ªè§’åº¦å¯ä»¥è¯´æ˜åæ–¹å·®çŸ©é˜µçš„ç‰¹å¾å€¼ä¸ºéè´Ÿå€¼ã€‚

  • è€Œä¸”äº‹å®ä¸Šåæ–¹å·®çŸ©é˜µæœ¬èº«å°±æ˜¯åŠæ­£å®šçš„ï¼Œç‰¹å¾å€¼å‡éè´Ÿ

  • ä¸ç›¸å…³ä¸ç‹¬ç«‹çš„é—®é¢˜ï¼š

    • æ­¤å¤„æˆ‘ä»¬è¯´æ˜äº†å˜æ¢åçš„å‘é‡ä¹‹é—´ç›¸å…³ç³»æ•°ä¸º0ï¼Œä¹Ÿå°±æ˜¯å‘é‡ä¹‹é—´ä¸ç›¸å…³
    • è€Œäº‹å®ä¸Šç‹¬ç«‹æ˜¯æ¯”ä¸ç›¸å…³æ›´å¼ºçš„çº¦æŸï¼Œä¸ç›¸å…³å¾€å¾€ä¸èƒ½æ¨å‡ºç‹¬ç«‹
    • ä½†åœ¨é«˜æ–¯åˆ†å¸ƒä¸‹ï¼Œä¸ç›¸å…³å’Œç‹¬ç«‹æ˜¯ç­‰ä»·çš„

æ¥ä¸‹æ¥æˆ‘ä»¬å¯¹å‘é‡è¿›è¡Œæ ‡å‡†åŒ–

  • å½“æˆ‘ä»¬å‡å»å‡å€¼åï¼Œå‘é‡å·²ç»å˜æˆäº†0å‡å€¼çš„å‘é‡ï¼Œè·ç¦»æ ‡å‡†åŒ–ä»…å·®å°†æ–¹å·®å˜ä¸º1

  • åœ¨ç»å†äº†$Y=Q^TX$å˜æ¢åï¼Œ$Y$çš„åæ–¹å·®çŸ©é˜µå·²ç»æˆä¸ºäº†å¯¹è§’é˜µï¼Œå¯¹è§’çº¿å…ƒç´ ä¸º$Y$ä¸­å„ä¸ªç»´åº¦æ•°æ®çš„æ–¹å·®ï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆæˆ‘ä»¬ä»…éœ€è®©$Y$ä¸­å„ä¸ªç»´åº¦æ•°æ®é™¤ä»¥è¯¥ç»´åº¦æ•°æ®çš„æ ‡å‡†å·®å³å¯ã€‚

  • æˆ‘ä»¬å°†å»ç›¸å…³åŒ–ã€0å‡å€¼åŒ–ã€æ ‡å‡†åŒ–è¿‡åçš„æ•°æ®è®°ä¸º$Z$ï¼š

    $$ \begin{aligned} Z &= \left[ {\begin{array}{*{20}{c}} {\frac{1}{{{\sigma _1}}}}&{}&{}&{}\\ {}&{\frac{1}{{{\sigma _2}}}}&{}&{}\\ {}&{}& \ddots &{}\\ {}&{}&{}&{\frac{1}{{{\sigma _n}}}} \end{array}} \right](Y - {\mu _Y}) \\&= \Sigma _Y^{ - \frac{1}{2}}{Q^T}(X - {\mu _X}) \\ &= ({Q^T}{\Sigma _X}Q)_{}^{ - \frac{1}{2}}{Q^T}(X - {\mu _X})\end{aligned} $$

  • è€Œé©¬æ°è·ç¦»å°±æ˜¯åº¦é‡çº æ­£è¿‡åçš„å‘é‡$Z$åˆ°åˆ†å¸ƒä¸­å¿ƒï¼ˆåŸç‚¹ï¼‰çš„æ¬§å¼è·ç¦»ï¼š

    $$\begin{array}{l}{D_M}(X) & =\sqrt {{Z^T}Z} \\&= \sqrt {{{\left( {X - {u_X}} \right)}^T}Q{{\left( {{Q^T}{\Sigma _X}Q} \right)}^{ - \frac{1}{2}}}{{\left( {{Q^T}{\Sigma _X}Q} \right)}^{ - \frac{1}{2}}}{Q^T}\left( {X - {u_X}} \right)} \\ &= \sqrt {{{\left( {X - {u_X}} \right)}^T}Q{{\left( {{Q^T}{\Sigma _X}Q} \right)}^{ - 1}}{Q^T}\left( {X - {u_X}} \right)} \\ &= \sqrt {{{\left( {X - {u_X}} \right)}^T}Q{Q^{ - 1}}\Sigma _X^{ - 1}Q{Q^T}\left( {X - {u_X}} \right)} \\ &= \sqrt {{{\left( {X - {u_X}} \right)}^T}\Sigma _X^{-1}\left( {X - {u_X}} \right)} \\\end{array}$$

è”åˆæ¦‚ç‡è´¨é‡å‡½æ•°
  • å½“$X$å’Œ$Y$éƒ½æ˜¯ç¦»æ•£éšæœºå˜é‡æ—¶ï¼Œ å®šä¹‰$X$å’Œ$Y$çš„è”åˆæ¦‚ç‡è´¨é‡å‡½æ•°ä¸ºï¼š
$$p(x, y)=P\{X=x, Y=y\}$$

$$

æ¦‚ç‡å¯†åº¦å‡½æ•°

$$P\{X \in \mathbb{A}, Y \in \mathbb{B}\}=\int_{\mathbb{B}} \int_{\mathbb{A}} p(x, y) d x d y$$

  • $X$å’Œ$Y$çš„è”åˆåˆ†å¸ƒä¸ºï¼š

entry.content:
çŸ©é˜µå¯¹å˜åŒ–çš„æ•æ„Ÿç¨‹åº¦å¯ä»¥ç”¨Condition Numberæ¥è¯„ä¼°ï¼Œæœ¬æ–‡å¯¹å…¶è¿›è¡Œç®€ç•¥ä»‹ç»ã€‚

å®šä¹‰

  • æ•°å€¼åˆ†æä¸­ï¼Œä¸€ä¸ªé—®é¢˜çš„æ¡ä»¶æ•°æ˜¯è¯¥æ•°é‡åœ¨æ•°å€¼è®¡ç®—ä¸­çš„å®¹æ˜“ç¨‹åº¦çš„è¡¡é‡ï¼Œä¹Ÿå°±æ˜¯è¯¥é—®é¢˜çš„é€‚å®šæ€§ã€‚ä¸€ä¸ªä½æ¡ä»¶æ•°çš„é—®é¢˜ç§°ä¸ºè‰¯ç½®çš„ï¼Œè€Œé«˜æ¡ä»¶æ•°çš„é—®é¢˜ç§°ä¸ºç—…æ€ï¼ˆæˆ–è€…è¯´éè‰¯ç½®ï¼‰çš„ã€‚â€”â€” ç»´åŸºç™¾ç§‘

ç›´ç™½æ¥è¯´å°±æ˜¯æè¿°ä¸€ä¸ªçŸ©é˜µæ˜¯å¦å˜åŒ–ç‡åœ¨å¯æ§èŒƒå›´å†…ï¼Œä¸‹æ–¹è¿™ä¸ªç¤ºä¾‹ç¨‹åºå¯ä»¥çœ‹åˆ°ï¼Œå½“è°ƒæ•´a, b, cçš„å€¼ä½¿å¾—æ¡ä»¶æ•°å¾ˆå¤§æ—¶ï¼ŒäºŒæ¬¡å‹æè¿°çš„æ›²é¢åœ¨æŸä¸ªæ–¹å‘ä¸Šä¼šæ‹‰çš„å¾ˆé•¿ï¼›åœ¨è¿™ç§æƒ…å†µä¸‹ï¼Œæ›²é¢ä¸Šçš„ç‚¹æ²¿ç€æŸä¸ªæ–¹å‘ä¼šå¾—åˆ°å·¨å¤§çš„å˜åŒ–ç‡ï¼Œè€Œæ²¿ç€æŸäº›æ–¹å‘å˜åŒ–ç‡åˆå¾ˆå°ï¼Œå½“æ¡ä»¶æ•°ä¸ºæ— ç©·å¤§æ—¶ç”šè‡³è¿™ä¸ªæ¯”å€¼ç”šè‡³ä¼šå˜å¾—æ— ç©·å¤§ã€‚

ä»¥ä¼˜åŒ–äºŒæ¬¡å‹ä¸ºä¾‹ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬çš„ç›®çš„æ—¶æ‰¾åˆ°çŸ©é˜µçš„æå€¼ï¼Œç„¶è€Œåœ¨æ‘¸ç´¢è¿‡ç¨‹ä¸­ï¼Œæ²¿ç€æœ‰äº›æ–¹å‘èµ°ä¸€å°æ­¥ç»“æœå°±äº§ç”Ÿäº†å·¨å¤§çš„å˜åŒ–ï¼Œå¦‚æœå¾€å¦ä¸€ä¸ªæ–¹å‘è¿˜èµ°è¿™ä¹ˆå¤§æ­¥å­åˆå¯èƒ½å¯¹ç»“æœæ²¡ä»€ä¹ˆå½±å“ï¼Œè¿™æ ·çš„äºŒæ¬¡å‹çŸ©é˜µç›¸å¯¹é‚£äº›å„ä¸ªæ–¹å‘å˜åŒ–ç‡å·®å¼‚å°çš„äºŒæ¬¡å‹å°±æ›´åŠ éš¾ä»¥ä¼˜åŒ–ã€‚

  • çŸ©é˜µ${\bf{A} } (n\times n)$çš„æ¡ä»¶æ•°ï¼Œç”¨$Cond(\bf{A})$è¡¨ç¤ºï¼Œæ•°å­¦ä¸Šçš„å®šä¹‰ä¸ºçŸ©é˜µç»å¯¹å€¼æœ€å¤§çš„å¥‡å¼‚å€¼(ç”¨$\lambda$è¡¨ç¤º)ä¸ç»å¯¹å€¼æœ€å°çš„å¥‡å¼‚å€¼çš„å•†ï¼š

$$
Cond({\bf{A} }) = \frac{ { {\lambda _1} } } { { {\lambda _n} } }
$$

è¿™ä¸ªå®šä¹‰çš„è§£é‡Šæ˜¯ç›´è§‚çš„ï¼Œæœ€å¤§çš„å¥‡å¼‚å€¼è¡¨ç¤ºçŸ©é˜µçš„èƒ½é‡ä¸»è½´ï¼Œè¡¨ç¤ºå¯èƒ½äº§ç”Ÿçš„æœ€å¤§å˜åŒ–ç‡ï¼š

$$
\max \frac{ {\left|| { {\bf{A}}x} \right||} }{ {\left|| x \right||} } = {\lambda _1}
$$

ç„¶åæœ€å°å¥‡å¼‚å€¼$\lambda _n$å¯¹åº”æœ€å°çš„å˜åŒ–ç‡ï¼š

$$
\min \frac{ {\left|| { {\bf{A}}x} \right||} }{ {\left|| x \right||} } = {\lambda _n}
$$

äºŒè€…çš„å•†å°±æ˜¯çŸ©é˜µçš„æ¡ä»¶æ•°ã€‚

å¦ä¸€ç§æ¨å¯¼æ€è·¯

  • åœ¨è¡¡é‡æŸä¸ªå‡½æ•°æ•æ„Ÿåº¦ä¸ç¨³å®šæ€§æ—¶ï¼Œå¸¸ä½¿ç”¨çš„ä¸€ç§æ–¹æ³•æ˜¯æ±‚å¯¼ã€‚å³è§‚å¯Ÿå¯¼æ•° $df(x)/dx$ çš„å¤§å°ã€‚

  • è€ƒè™‘çº¿æ€§ç³»ç»Ÿ$\bf{A}x=b$ï¼Œå…¶ä¸­çŸ©é˜µ$\bf{A}$ä¸º$n$é˜¶å¯é€†æ–¹é˜µ

  • åœ¨$\bf{x}$ä¸ŠåŠ å…¥ä¸€ä¸ªå°æ‰°åŠ¨$\delta $ï¼Œç³»ç»Ÿå˜ä¸ºï¼š

$$
{\bf{A} }( {\bf{x}} + {\bf{\delta } }) = b + {\bf{A\delta } }
$$

  • ç”¨åœ¨$\bf{b}$ä¸Šçš„å˜åŒ–ç‡ä¸$\bf{x}$ä¸Šçš„å˜åŒ–ç‡çš„æ¯”å€¼è¡¨ç¤ºçº¿æ€§ç³»ç»Ÿçš„ç¨³å®šç¨‹åº¦ï¼Œè¿™ä¸ªç¨³å®šç¨‹åº¦æˆ‘ä»¬ç”¨å­—æ¯$C$è¡¨ç¤ºï¼š
$$\begin{array}{l}C &= \frac{{\left| {\left| {{\bf{A\delta }}} \right|} \right|/\left| {\left| {\bf{b}} \right|} \right|}}{{\left| {\left| {\bf{\delta }} \right|} \right|/\left| {\left| {\bf{x}} \right|} \right|}}\\ &= \frac{{\left| {\left| {{\bf{A\delta }}} \right|} \right|}}{{\left| {\left| {\bf{\delta }} \right|} \right|}} \cdot \frac{{\left| {\left| {\bf{x}} \right|} \right|}}{{\left| {\left| {\bf{b}} \right|} \right|}}\\ &= \frac{{\left| {\left| {{\bf{A\delta }}} \right|} \right|}}{{\left| {\left| {\bf{\delta }} \right|} \right|}} \cdot \frac{{\left| {\left| {{{\bf{A}}^{ - 1}}{\bf{b}}} \right|} \right|}}{{\left| {\left| {\bf{b}} \right|} \right|}}\end{array}$$
  • å…¶ä¸­æ¨¡é•¿ä¸ºèŒƒæ•°æ“ä½œï¼Œæ ¹æ®èŒƒæ•°çš„ç›¸å®¹æ€§ï¼Œæœ‰ï¼š
$$\begin{array}{l}C &= \frac{{\left| {\left| {{\bf{A\delta }}} \right|} \right|}}{{\left| {\left| {\bf{\delta }} \right|} \right|}} \cdot \frac{{\left| {\left| {{{\bf{A}}^{ - 1}}{\bf{b}}} \right|} \right|}}{{\left| {\left| {\bf{b}} \right|} \right|}}\\ &\le \frac{{\left| {\left| {\bf{A}} \right|} \right|\left| {\left| {\bf{\delta }} \right|} \right|}}{{\left| {\left| {\bf{\delta }} \right|} \right|}} \cdot \frac{{\left| {\left| {{{\bf{A}}^{ - 1}}} \right|} \right|\left| {\left| {\bf{b}} \right|} \right|}}{{\left| {\left| {\bf{b}} \right|} \right|}}\\ &= \left| {\left| {\bf{A}} \right|} \right|\left| {\left| {{{\bf{A}}^{ - 1}}} \right|} \right|\end{array}$$

æ¡ä»¶æ•°çš„æ€§è´¨

  • å¯¹ä»»ä½•éé›¶çŸ©é˜µ$ \bf{A}$, $Cond{\rm{ } }\left( A \right){\rm{ } } \ge {\rm{ } }1$

  • $Cond\left( \bf{I} \right){\rm{ } } = {\rm{ } }1$, $\bf{I}$ æ˜¯å•ä½çŸ©é˜µ

  • $Cond\left( {s{\bf{A} } } \right){\rm{ } } = {\rm{ } }Cond\left( {\bf{A} } \right)$, å…¶ä¸­$s$æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªæ ‡é‡

  • å¯¹äºä»»ä½•å¯¹è§’çŸ©é˜µ${\bf{A} }{\rm{ } } = {\rm{ } }diag\left( {\bf{d} } \right)$ï¼Œ$Cond\left( {\bf{A} } \right){\rm{ } } = {\rm{ } }max({\bf{d} }){\rm{ } }/{\rm{ }}min({\bf{d} })$

$$

  • çŸ©é˜µ$ f{A}$æ­£å®šå¯¹ç§°
  • ç›®æ ‡ä¸ºä¼˜åŒ–$ f{x}$ï¼Œä½¿å¾—$f( f{x})$å–å¾—æœ€å°å€¼

  • å¯¼è‡´ä¼˜åŒ–è¿‡ç¨‹éœ€è¦åå¤è¿­ä»£æ‰èƒ½é€æ­¥é€¼è¿‘æœ€ä¼˜å€¼

è½­

è½­æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªæ±‰å­—ï¼Œè¯»ä½œÃ¨ï¼Œæœ¬æ„æ˜¯æŒ‡é©¾è½¦æ—¶å¥—åœ¨ç‰²å£è„–å­ä¸Šçš„æ›²æœ¨ï¼Œå¼•ç”³ä¹‰æ˜¯æŸç¼šï¼Œæ§åˆ¶ã€‚è¯¥æ–‡å­—åœ¨ã€Šä»ªç¤¼Â·æ—¢å¤•ç¤¼ã€‹å’Œã€Šè€å­Â·æ­£è®ºã€‹ç­‰æ–‡çŒ®å‡æœ‰è®°è½½ã€‚â€”â€”ç™¾åº¦ç™¾ç§‘

  • æ•°å­¦ä¸­å¾ˆå¤šè½­ç›¸å…³çš„å†…å®¹ï¼Œæ­¤å¤„çš„å…±è½­è¡¨ç¤ºç›¸äº’çº¦æŸï¼Œåœ¨æŸä¸ªæ¡ä»¶ä¸‹å¯ä»¥ç›¸äº’ä½œç”¨çš„æ„æ€ã€‚

å…±è½­æ¢¯åº¦æ³•æ€æƒ³æ¥æº

  • é‚£ä¹ˆå‡è®¾æˆ‘ä»¬ä½¿ç”¨å…³äºè¯¥é—®é¢˜ç²¾ç¡®çš„æ¨¡å‹è€Œä¸æ˜¯è¿‘ä¼¼çš„å±€éƒ¨æœ€ä¼˜æ¨¡å‹ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬å¦‚æœå¯ä»¥åœ¨æŸä¸ªNç»´ç©ºé—´ä¸­ï¼Œåˆ†åˆ«è®¡ç®—å‡ºæœ€ä¼˜è§£çš„å„ä¸ªç»´åº¦çš„åæ ‡ï¼Œå°±å¯ä»¥è¾¾åˆ°ä¸Šè¿°ç›®çš„
  • é‚£ä¹ˆå¦‚ä½•è®¾è®¡è¿™ä¸ªç©ºé—´ï¼Œå¦‚ä½•å¯ä»¥åˆ†æ­¥è®¡ç®—å¹¶ä¸”å¯ä»¥æ•´åˆæˆçœŸæ­£çš„ç»“æœï¼Œæ˜¯å…±è½­æ¢¯åº¦æ³•æ¥è§£å†³çš„é—®é¢˜
  • è¯¥æ–¹æ³•çš„æ ¸å¿ƒæ€æƒ³æ˜¯å»ºç«‹ä¸€ç»„Nç»´ç©ºé—´çº¿æ€§æ— å…³çš„ä¸€ç»„åŸºï¼Œç†è®ºä¸Šè¿™ç»„åŸºçš„çº¿æ€§ç»„åˆå¯ä»¥è¡¨ç¤ºç©ºé—´ä¸­ä»»æ„ä¸€ç‚¹ï¼Œå…±è½­æ¢¯åº¦æ³•é€šè¿‡å¤šæ¬¡è®¡ç®—ï¼Œç²¾ç¡®æ±‚è§£ç›®æ ‡åœ¨ç©ºé—´ä¸­ä½ç½®åœ¨è¿™ç»„åŸºç©ºé—´ä¸­çš„å„ä¸ªç³»æ•°åˆ†é‡ï¼Œè¾¾åˆ°æ±‚è§£æœ€ä¼˜å€¼çš„ç›®çš„
  • è¯¥æ–¹æ³•å’Œæœ€é€Ÿä¸‹é™æ³•å´åˆ«åœ¨ç²¾ç¡®å»ºæ¨¡ï¼Œæœ‰äº†ä¸Šå¸è§†è§’ï¼Œæ¯æ¬¡è¿­ä»£è®¡ç®—å°†è¯¥æ–¹å‘éœ€è¦è°ƒæ•´çš„åˆ†é‡å€¼è°ƒæ•´åˆ°æè‡´ï¼Œä¹Ÿå°±æ˜¯è¯´ä¹‹åçš„è®¡ç®—å†ä¹Ÿä¸ç”¨è€ƒè™‘è¯¥æ–¹å‘ä¸Šçš„è¿åŠ¨åˆ†é‡äº†ï¼Œè¿™æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªç²¾ç¡®æ±‚è§£é—®é¢˜çš„è¿‡ç¨‹ï¼Œä¸æ˜¯é€æ­¥ç®€å•å»ºæ¨¡å‘æœ€ä¼˜å€¼æŒªåŠ¨çš„é€¼è¿‘è¿‡ç¨‹

å…±è½­åŸºçš„å®šä¹‰

NameValueDescriptionSince
appNameeg "graphing"app name, default: â€œclassicâ€â€œgraphingâ€ â€¦ GeoGebra Graphing Calculator â€œgeometryâ€ â€¦ GeoGebra Geometry â€œ3dâ€ â€¦ GeoGebra 3D Graphing Calculator â€œclassicâ€ â€¦ GeoGebra Classic â€œsuiteâ€ â€¦ GeoGebra Calculator Suite â€œevaluatorâ€ â€¦ Equation Editor6.0
widtheg 800Applet width (compulsory field)
heighteg 600Applet height (compulsory field)
material_ideg "RHYH3UQ8"GeoGebra Materials id to load See first applet here: https://dev.geogebra.org/examples/html/example-multiple.html5.0
filenameeg "myFile.ggb"URL of file to load See second applet here: https://dev.geogebra.org/examples/html/example-multiple.html4.0
ggbBase64base64 encoded .ggb fileEncoded file to load. See the applet here: https://dev.geogebra.org/examples/html/example-single.html4.0
borderColore.g. #FFFFFF for whiteColor of the border line drawn around the applet panel (as hex rgb string). Default: gray3.0
enableRightClicktrue or falseStates whether right clicks should be handled by the applet. Setting this parameter to â€œfalseâ€ disables context menus, properties dialogs and right-click-zooming. Default: true. NB also enables/disables some keyboard shortcuts eg Delete and Ctrl + R (recompute all objects). Default: true3.0
enableLabelDragstrue or falseStates whether labels can be dragged. Default: true3.2
enableShiftDragZoomtrue or falseStates whether the Graphics View(s) should be moveable using Shift + mouse drag (or. Ctrl + mouse drag) or zoomable using Shift + mouse wheel (or Ctrl + mouse wheel). Setting this parameter to â€œfalseâ€ disables moving and zooming of the drawing pad. Default: true3.0
showZoomButtonstrue or falseStates whether the zoom in / zoom out / home buttons should be shown in the Graphics View or not. Default: false6.0
errorDialogsActivetrue or falseStates whether error dialogs will be shown if an invalid input is entered (using the Input Bar or JavaScript) Default: true3.2
showMenuBartrue or falseStates whether the menubar of GeoGebra should be shown in the applet. Default: false2.5
showToolBartrue or falseStates whether the toolbar with the construction mode buttons should be shown in the applet. Default: false2.5
showToolBarHelptrue or falseStates whether the toolbar help text right to the toolbar buttons should be shown in the applet3.0
customToolBare.g. 0 1 2 3 , 4 5 6 7Sets the toolbar according to a custom toolbar string where the int values are Toolbar Mode Values, , adds a separator within a menu, | starts a new menu and || adds a separator in the toolbar before starting a new menu. Custom tools are numbered 1001, 1002, etc in GeoGebra 3.2 and 100 001, 100 002, etc from GeoGebra 4.2.5
showAlgebraInputtrue or falseStates whether the algebra input line (with input field, greek letters and command list) should be shown in the applet. Default: false2.5
showResetIcontrue or falseStates whether a small icon (GeoGebra ellipse) should be shown in the upper right corner of the applet. Clicking on this icon resets the applet (i.e. it reloads the file given in the filename parameter). Default: false2.5
languageiso language stringGeoGebra tries to set your local language automatically (if it is available among the supported languages, of course). The default language for unsupported languages is English. If you want to specify a certain language manually, please use this parameter.2.5
countryiso country string, e.g. AT for AustriaThis parameter only makes sense if you use it together with the language parameter.2.5
ideg applet2This parameter allows you to specify the argument passed to the JavaScript function ggbOnInit(), which is called once the applet is fully initialised. This is useful when you have multiple applets on a page - see this example (will have no effect in earlier versions)3.2
allowStyleBartrue or falseDefault: false Determines whether the Style Bar can be shown (or will be shown if just Graphics View 1 is showing)4.0
appletOnLoadeg function(api){ api.evalCommand('Segment((1,2),(3,4))'); }JavaScript method to run when the activity is initialized (and file loaded if applicable)5.0
useBrowserForJStrue or falseWhen true, GeoGebraruns ggbOnInit from HTMLignores ggbOnInit from fileignores JS update scripts of objects in fileWhen false, GeoGebra:ignores ggbOnInit from HTML (use appletOnLoad parameter of GGBApplet instead)runs ggbOnInit from fileruns JS update scripts of objects in fileDefault: false4.0
showLoggingtrue or falseDefault: false Determines whether logging is shown in the Browserâ€™s console4.2
capturingThresholdintegerDefault: 3 Determines the sensitivity of object selection. The default value of 3 is usually fine to select and drag objects both with the mouse and touch. Use larger values (e.g. 4 or 5) to make it easier to select and drag objects.4.4
enableFileFeaturestrue or falseDefault: true Determines whether file saving, file loading, sign in and Options > Save settings are enabled. This argument is ignored when menubar is not showing.5.0
perspectivestringFor values see SetPerspective_Command. Just for a blank start ie shouldnâ€™t be used with material_id, filename or ggbBase64 parameters5.0
enable3dtrue or false or noneWhether 3D should be enabled (for exam mode). When neither true nor false are entered, user can decide in a dialog.5.0
enableCAStrue or false or noneWhether CAS should be enabled (for exam mode). When neither true nor false are entered, user can decide in a dialog.5.0
algebraInputPositionalgebra, top or bottomDefault: empty Determines whether input bar should be shown in algebra, on top of the applet or under the applet. When left empty, the position depends on file.5.0
preventFocustrue or falseDefault: false. When set to true, this prevents the applet from getting focus automatically at the start.5.0
scaleContainerClassStringName of CSS class that is used as container; applet will scale to fit into the container.5.0
autoHeightbooleanâ€¢ true to restrict the width of the applet and compute height automatically, add autoHeight:true â€¢ falseif you want the applet to be restricted by both width and height of the container5.0
allowUpscaletrue or falseDefault: false Determines whether automatic scaling may scale the applet up5.0
playButtontrue or falseDefault: false Determines whether a preview image and a play button should be rendered in place of the applet. Pushing the play button initializes the applet.5.0
scalenumberRatio by which the applet should be scaled (eg. 2 makes the applet 2 times bigger, including all texts and UI elements). Default: 15.0
showAnimationButtontrue or falseWhether animation button should be visible5.0
showFullscreenButtontrue or falseWhether fullscreen button should be visible6.0
showSuggestionButtonstrue or falseWhether suggestion buttons (special points, solve) in Algebra View should be visible6.0
showStartTooltiptrue or falseWhether â€œWelcomeâ€ tooltip should be shown5.0
roundingstringString composed of number of decimal places and flags â€“ valid flags are â€œsâ€ for significant digits and â€œrâ€ for rational numbers. Hence â€œ10â€ means 10 decimal places, â€œ10sâ€ stands for 10 significant digits.6.0
buttonShadowstrue or falseWhether buttons should have shadow6.0
buttonRoundingNumber (0 - 0.9)Relative radius of buttonâ€™s rounded border. The border radius in pixels is buttonRounding * height /2, where height is the height of the button. Default 0.2.6.0
buttonBorderColorHex color (#RGB, #RGBA, #RRGGBB or #RRGGBBAA)Border color of buttons on the graphics view. Default is black, if the button background is white, otherwise one shade darker than the background color6.0
editorBackgroundColorHex colorBackground color of the evaluator app6.0
editorForegroundColorHex colorForeground (text) color of the equation editor (appname = â€œevaluatorâ€)6.0
textmodefalse], default falsewhether editor is in text mode or not (appname = â€œevaluatorâ€)6.0
keyboardTypeâ€œnormalâ€|â€œnotesâ€]Which keyboard is shown for equation editor (appname = â€œevaluatorâ€)6.0

Netron supports ONNX (.onnx, .pb, .pbtxt), Keras (.h5, .keras), Core ML (.mlmodel), Caffe (.caffemodel, .prototxt), Caffe2 (predict_net.pb), Darknet (.cfg), MXNet (.model, -symbol.json), Barracuda (.nn), ncnn (.param), Tengine (.tmfile), TNN (.tnnproto), UFF (.uff) and TensorFlow Lite (.tflite).

Netron has experimental support for TorchScript (.pt, .pth), PyTorch (.pt, .pth), Torch (.t7), Arm NN (.armnn), BigDL (.bigdl, .model), Chainer (.npz, .h5), CNTK (.model, .cntk), Deeplearning4j (.zip), MediaPipe (.pbtxt), ML.NET (.zip), MNN (.mnn), PaddlePaddle (.zip, __model__), OpenVINO (.xml), scikit-learn (.pkl), TensorFlow.js (model.json, .pb) and TensorFlow (.pb, .meta, .pbtxt, .ckpt, .index).

$$
f({x_1},{x_2},{x_3},â€¦,{x_n}) = {a_{1,1}}x_1^2 + {a_{1,2}}{x_1}{x_2} + {a_{1,3}}{x_1}{x_3} + \cdots + {a_{1,n}}{x_1}{x_n} + {a_{2,1}}x_2{x_1} + {a_{2,2}}{x_2^2} + {a_{2,3}}{x_2}{x_3} + \cdots + {a_{2,n}}{x_2}{x_n} + \cdots + {a_{n,n}}x_n^2+{b_1}x_1+{b_2}x_2+\cdots+{b_n}x_n+c
$$

å…¶ä¸­$a_{i,j}$ä¸ºäºŒæ¬¡é¡¹ç³»æ•°ï¼Œå…±æœ‰$n^2$é¡¹ï¼Œ$1 \le i,j \le n$ï¼Œä¸”æ‰€æœ‰çš„$a$ä¸å…¨ä¸º0ï¼Œå³$\exists a_{i,j} \ne 0$;

$b_k$ä¸ºä¸€æ¬¡é¡¹ç³»æ•°ï¼Œå…±$n$é¡¹ï¼Œ$1 \le k \le n$;

$c$ä¸ºå¸¸æ•°é¡¹ã€‚

  • è®° $f({\bf{x}}) = {[{x_1},{x_2}, \cdots ,{x_n}]^T}$ ï¼Œåˆ™ä¸Šè¿°å‡½æ•°å¯ä»¥å†™ä½œäºŒæ¬¡å‹çš„å½¢å¼ï¼š

$$

$$

è½¬åŒ–è¿‡ç¨‹ä¸­$\bf{A},\bf{b}$æ»¡è¶³ï¼š

${\bf{A} }$ ä¸º$n$é˜¶å¯¹ç§°æ–¹é˜µï¼Œ${ { \bf { A } } _ { i , j } } = { a _ { i , j } }$

$$

$$

  • æˆ‘ä»¬çš„ç›®æ ‡å°±æ˜¯å¯»æ‰¾è¯¥å‡½æ•°çš„æå€¼ç‚¹çš„åæ ‡ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬æŠŠè¯¥ç›®æ ‡ç§°ä¸º$\bf{x^*}$ã€‚

Returns

loop.index: The current iteration of the loop (1-indexed)

Precision

è¯‘ä¸ºï¼šç²¾ç¡®ç‡ï¼ŒæŸ¥å‡†ç‡ã€‚

å«ä¹‰ï¼šé¢„æµ‹æ‰€æœ‰æ­£æ ·æœ¬ä¸­åˆ¤æ–­æ­£ç¡®çš„æ¯”ä¾‹ï¼š

$$
Precision=\frac{TP}{TP+FP}
$$

é¢„æµ‹ç”¨ä¾‹Precisionï¼š

$$
Precision_{é¢„æµ‹1}=\frac{TP}{TP+FP}=\frac{3}{3+0}=1
$$

$$
Precision_{é¢„æµ‹2}=\frac{TP}{TP+FP}=\frac{5}{5+1}\approx 0.83
$$

$$
Precision_{é¢„æµ‹3}=\frac{TP}{TP+FP}=\frac{7}{7+3}=0.7
$$

å¯ä»¥çœ‹åˆ°é¢„æµ‹1åˆ¤æ–­å‡ºçš„æ­£æ ·æœ¬å…¨éƒ¨æ­£ç¡®ï¼Œå› æ­¤è¯¥é¢„æµ‹å…·æœ‰æœ€é«˜çš„æŸ¥å‡†ç‡ã€‚

å¯ä»¥ç†è§£Precisionä¸ºæ¨¡å‹åˆ¤æ–­ä¸ºæ­£æ ·æœ¬çš„ç½®ä¿¡æ¦‚ç‡ï¼Œæ¦‚ç‡è¶Šé«˜ï¼Œè¯¥æ¨¡å‹åˆ¤æ–­å‡ºçš„æ­£æ ·æœ¬è¶Šå¯ä¿¡ã€‚

FDRï¼ˆFalse Discorvery Rateï¼‰

è¯‘ä¸ºï¼šè¿‡æ€ç‡(å·¥ä¸šç¼ºé™·)ã€‚
å«ä¹‰ï¼šåæ˜ äº†æ£€æµ‹å™¨åˆ¤æ–­ä¸ºæ­£æ ·æœ¬çš„æ ·æœ¬ä¸­ï¼Œè´Ÿæ ·æœ¬æ‰€å æ¯”ä¾‹ï¼š

$$
FDR=\frac{FP}{TP+FP}=1-Precision
$$

é¢„æµ‹ç”¨ä¾‹FAï¼š

$$
FDR_{é¢„æµ‹1}=\frac{FP}{TP+FP}=\frac{0}{3+0}=0
$$

$$
FDR_{é¢„æµ‹2}=\frac{FP}{TP+FP}=\frac{1}{5+1}\approx0.17
$$

$$
FDR_{é¢„æµ‹3}=\frac{FP}{TP+FP}=\frac{3}{7+3}=0.3
$$

Recall / Sensitivity / TPRï¼ˆTrue Positive Rateï¼‰

è¯‘ä¸ºï¼šå¬å›ç‡ï¼ŒæŸ¥å…¨ç‡ ï¼Œ æ•æ„Ÿæ€§ ï¼Œ çœŸæ­£ç‡ã€‚

å«ä¹‰ï¼šé¢„æµ‹æ­£ç¡®çš„æ‰€æœ‰æ­£æ ·æœ¬å å®é™…æ‰€æœ‰æ­£æ ·æœ¬çš„æ¯”ä¾‹ï¼š

$$
Recall=Sensitivity=TPR=\frac{TP}{TP+FN}
$$

é¢„æµ‹ç”¨ä¾‹Recall / Sensitivity / TPRï¼š

$$
Recall_{é¢„æµ‹1}=\frac{TP}{TP+FN}=\frac{3}{3+4}\approx0.43
$$

$$
Recall_{é¢„æµ‹2}=\frac{TP}{TP+FN}=\frac{5}{5+2}\approx0.71
$$

$$
Recall_{é¢„æµ‹3}=\frac{TP}{TP+FN}=\frac{7}{7+0}=1
$$

æŸ¥å…¨ç‡å’ŒæŸ¥å‡†ç‡è€ƒé‡è§’åº¦ä¸åŒï¼Œä¸å…³æ³¨æ¨¡å‹åˆ¤æ–­å‡ºæ­£æ ·æœ¬æ˜¯å¦è¶³å¤Ÿå‡†ç¡®ï¼Œå…³æ³¨æ¨¡å‹æŒ‘å¯¹çš„æ­£æ ·æœ¬å å…¨éƒ¨æ­£æ ·æœ¬çš„æ¯”ä¾‹ã€‚

å› æ­¤æœ€ç®€å•åˆ¤æ–­æ‰€æœ‰æ ·æœ¬ä¸ºæ­£çš„ç­–ç•¥å¯ä»¥å¾—åˆ°100%çš„æŸ¥å…¨ç‡ï¼Œå› ä¸ºè¿™ä¸ªæ¨¡å‹æŸ¥åˆ°çš„æ­£æ ·æœ¬å¾ˆâ€œå…¨â€ã€‚

Specificity / TNR ï¼ˆTrue Negative Rateï¼‰

è¯‘ä¸ºï¼šç‰¹å¼‚åº¦ï¼ŒçœŸè´Ÿç‡ã€‚
å«ä¹‰ï¼šé¢„æµ‹æ­£ç¡®çš„æ‰€æœ‰è´Ÿæ ·æœ¬å å®é™…æ‰€æœ‰è´Ÿæ ·æœ¬çš„æ¯”ä¾‹ï¼š

$$
Specificity=TNR=\frac{TN}{TN+FP}
$$

é¢„æµ‹ç”¨ä¾‹Specificity / TNR ï¼š

$$
Specificity_{é¢„æµ‹1}=\frac{TN}{TN+FP}=\frac{3}{3+0}=1
$$

$$
Specificity_{é¢„æµ‹2}=\frac{TN}{TN+FP}=\frac{2}{2+1}\approx0.67
$$

$$
Specificity_{é¢„æµ‹3}=\frac{TN}{TN+FP}=\frac{0}{0+3}=0
$$

ä¸æŸ¥å…¨ç‡ç›¸ä¼¼ï¼Œæè¿°çš„æ˜¯å¦ä¸€è¾¹çš„æƒ…å†µã€‚

FPRï¼ˆFalse Positive Rateï¼‰

è¯‘ä¸ºï¼šå‡æ­£ç‡ï¼Œè¯¯æ£€ç‡ï¼Œè™šè­¦æ¦‚ç‡ã€‚
å«ä¹‰ï¼šé¢„æµ‹è¯¯åˆ¤ä¸ºæ­£æ ·æœ¬çš„è´Ÿæ ·æœ¬æ•°é‡å å®é™…æ‰€æœ‰è´Ÿæ ·æœ¬çš„æ¯”ä¾‹ï¼š

$$
FPR=\frac{FP}{FP+TN}
$$

é¢„æµ‹ç”¨ä¾‹FPRï¼š

$$
FPR_{é¢„æµ‹1}=\frac{FP}{FP+TN}=\frac{0}{0+3}=0
$$

$$
FPR_{é¢„æµ‹2}=\frac{FP}{FP+TN}=\frac{1}{1+2}\approx0.33
$$

$$
FPR_{é¢„æµ‹3}=\frac{FP}{FP+TN}=\frac{3}{3+0}=1
$$

FNRï¼ˆFalse Negative Rateï¼‰

è¯‘ä¸ºï¼šå‡è´Ÿç‡ï¼Œæ¼è­¦æ¦‚ç‡ï¼Œæ¼æ£€ç‡ã€‚
å«ä¹‰ï¼šé¢„æµ‹è¯¯åˆ¤ä¸ºè´Ÿæ ·æœ¬çš„æ­£æ ·æœ¬æ•°é‡å å®é™…æ‰€æœ‰æ­£æ ·æœ¬çš„æ¯”ä¾‹ï¼š

$$
FNR=\frac{FN}{FN+TP}=1-Recall
$$

é¢„æµ‹ç”¨ä¾‹FNRï¼š

$$
FNR_{é¢„æµ‹1}=\frac{FN}{FN+TP}=\frac{4}{4+3}\approx0.57
$$

$$
FNR_{é¢„æµ‹2}=\frac{FN}{FN+TP}=\frac{2}{2+5}\approx0.29
$$

$$
FNR_{é¢„æµ‹3}=\frac{FN}{FN+TP}=\frac{0}{0+7}=0
$$

Accuracy

è¯‘ä¸ºï¼šæ­£ç¡®ç‡
å«ä¹‰ï¼šæ‰€æœ‰å®éªŒä¸­é¢„æµ‹æ­£ç¡®çš„æ ·æœ¬æ•°å æ‰€æœ‰æ ·æœ¬æ•°é‡çš„æ¯”ä¾‹ã€‚

$$
Accuracy=\frac{TP+TN}{TP+FP+TN+FN}
$$

é¢„æµ‹ç”¨ä¾‹Accuracyï¼š

$$
Accuracy_{é¢„æµ‹1}=\frac{TP+TN}{TP+FP+TN+FN}=\frac{3+3}{3+0+3+4}=0.6
$$

$$
Accuracy_{é¢„æµ‹2}=\frac{TP+TN}{TP+FP+TN+FN}=\frac{5+2}{5+1+2+2}=0.7
$$

$$
Accuracy_{é¢„æµ‹3}=\frac{TP+TN}{TP+FP+TN+FN}=\frac{7+0}{7+3+0+0}=0.7
$$

äº‹å®ä¸Šé¢„æµ‹1,2çš„æ¨¡å‹å¯¹æ­£ã€è´Ÿæ ·æœ¬éƒ½æ˜¯æœ‰æœ‰ä¸€å®šæ­£ç¡®åˆ†ç±»èƒ½åŠ›çš„ï¼Œé¢„æµ‹3æ¨¡å‹ä»…ä»…ä½¿ç”¨äº†â€œå°†æ‰€æœ‰æ ·æœ¬éƒ½åˆ¤ä¸ºæ­£â€çš„ç­–ç•¥æ—¢æ”¶è·äº†æœ€é«˜çš„æ­£ç¡®ç‡ï¼Œå¹¶ä¸æ˜¯è¿™ä¸ªæŒ‡æ ‡æœ‰é—®é¢˜ï¼Œè€Œæ˜¯æ•°æ®åˆ†å¸ƒæœ¬èº«å¹¶ä¸å¹³è¡¡ã€‚

æ ·æœ¬ä¸­æ­£æ ·æœ¬å±…å¤šï¼Œé¢„æµ‹3çš„æ¨¡å‹æˆåŠŸé¢„æµ‹äº†æ•°æ®ä¸­æ­£æ ·æœ¬å å¤§å¤šæ•°ï¼Œå› æ­¤ç­–ç•¥å¾—åˆ°äº†é«˜æ­£ç¡®ç‡çš„å›æŠ¥ã€‚

Error Rate

è¯‘ä¸ºï¼šé”™è¯¯ç‡
å«ä¹‰ï¼šæ‰€æœ‰å®éªŒä¸­é¢„æµ‹é”™è¯¯çš„æ ·æœ¬æ•°å æ‰€æœ‰æ ·æœ¬æ•°é‡çš„æ¯”ä¾‹ã€‚

$$
Error_Rate=\frac{FP+FN}{TP+FP+TN+FN}=1-Accuracy
$$

é¢„æµ‹ç”¨ä¾‹Accuracyï¼š

$$
Error_Rate_{é¢„æµ‹1}=\frac{FP+FN}{TP+FP+TN+FN}=\frac{0+4}{3+0+3+4}=0.4
$$

$$
Error_Rate_{é¢„æµ‹2}=\frac{FP+FN}{TP+FP+TN+FN}=\frac{1+2}{5+1+2+2}=0.3
$$

$$
Error_Rate_{é¢„æµ‹3}=\frac{FP+FN}{TP+FP+TN+FN}=\frac{3+0}{7+3+0+0}=0.3
$$

F1 Score / Balanced F Score

è¯‘ä¸ºï¼šF1 åˆ†æ•° / å¹³è¡¡Fåˆ†æ•°
å«ä¹‰ï¼šF1åˆ†æ•°å…¼é¡¾äº†åˆ†ç±»æ¨¡å‹çš„ç²¾ç¡®ç‡å’Œå¬å›ç‡ï¼Œå®šä¹‰ä¸ºæ¨¡å‹ç²¾ç¡®ç‡å’Œå¬å›ç‡çš„è°ƒå’Œå¹³å‡æ•°ã€‚

$$
F_1 Score=2\times\frac{Precision\times Recall}{Precision+ Recall}
$$

é¢„æµ‹ç”¨ä¾‹F1 Scoreï¼š

$$
F_1 Score_{é¢„æµ‹1}=2\times\frac{Precision_{é¢„æµ‹1}\times Recall_{é¢„æµ‹1}}{Precision_{é¢„æµ‹1}+ Recall_{é¢„æµ‹1}}=2\times\frac{1\times \frac{3}{7}}{1+ \frac{3}{7}}= 0.6
$$

$$
F_1 Score_{é¢„æµ‹2}=2\times\frac{Precision_{é¢„æµ‹2}\times Recall_{é¢„æµ‹2}}{Precision_{é¢„æµ‹2}+ Recall_{é¢„æµ‹2}}=2\times\frac{\frac{5}{6} \times \frac{5}{7}}{\frac{5}{6} + \frac{5}{7}}\approx 0.77
$$

$$
F_1 Score_{é¢„æµ‹3}=2\times\frac{Precision_{é¢„æµ‹3}\times Recall_{é¢„æµ‹3}}{Precision_{é¢„æµ‹3}+ Recall_{é¢„æµ‹3}}=2\times\frac{0.7 \times 1}{0.7 + 1}\approx 0.82
$$
